subject: CHARUSAT | FoH | Story Narrating Competition
snippet: Foundation Day 2025 Story Narrating Competition 2025 Jointly organized by Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management [IIIM] & Faculty of Humanities [FoH] "Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your
content:
[Foundation Day 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/20986db598676eb1ed549684c002d31f5728889c]


STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025

 Jointly organized by 

INDUKAKA IPCOWALA INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT [IIIM]
&
FACULTY OF HUMANITIES [FOH]

"Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your Story Shine!"

"Storytelling is an age-old art that captivates audiences, stimulates
imagination, and preserves cultural heritage. Join us in this exciting
event where stories come to life, imagination knows no bounds, and
voices create unforgettable experiences!" 

ğŸŒŸ ABOUT THE EVENT

STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025, organized under the theme
INDIAN KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM, is here to celebrate creativity, culture, and
storytelling!

ğŸ“… DATE & TIME: February 21, 2025 | 10:30 AM onwards 

ğŸ­ REGISTRATION DETAILS

 	* REGISTER BY: February 20, 2025
 	* STORY THEME: Folk Tales, Inspirational Stories, Mythological
Tales, or Fictional Narratives

Register Now
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/deffdbff2458022a5a6fc21a81761850f8a7161d]


ğŸ† AWARDS & CERTIFICATIONS

 	* ğŸ… WINNER & RUNNER-UP: Trophy
 	* ğŸ“œ ALL PARTICIPANTS: Participation Certificate
 	* EVENT CONVENORS: Dr. Binit Patel | Dr. Bhaskar Pandya
 	* EVENT COORDINATOR: Dr. Kinjal Bhatia
 	* CONTACT INFORMATION: +91 9033395935
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/309b22b6c6cc4f64be972de0ba0d4daab6df6da8]

ğŸ“¢ GENERAL RULES

 	* The competition is open to all registered students. Participants
must confirm their registration before the event.
 	* The narration must be in English.
 	* Each participant will have a 3 to 5-minute time slot for their
narration. Exceeding the limit may result in a penalty.
 	* Minimal use of handheld props is allowed, but the focus should
remain on narration. Visual presentations are not permitted.
 	* The storytelling should be engaging, expressive, and creative.
Unique presentation styles are encouraged.
 	* Participants must narrate their stories from memory. Reading
directly from a script is not allowed.

ğŸ”¹ JUDGING CRITERIA

 	* ğŸ“– Content & Creativity
 	* ğŸ¤ Expression & Voice Modulation
 	* ğŸ’ƒ Body Language & Presentation
 	* â³ Time Management
 	* ğŸŒŸ Overall Impact

ğŸ”¹ ADDITIONAL GUILDELINES

 	* DRESS CODE: Participants should dress appropriately for their
narration. Costumes are optional but should not overpower the
storytelling.
 	* PUNCTUALITY: Participants must arrive at least 30 minutes before
their scheduled slot.

ğŸ¤ We can't wait to hear your stories! See you there! ğŸ­

-------------------------

With best Regards,
MR. KRUTEN PATEL
Executive Officer - Corporate Communications

subject: MSUD102-Reading Material, Assignment, and Practice Examples for Unit 2 & Unit 5
snippet: Dear Students, I have attached the reading material for Unit 2 and Unit 5, along with assignment questions and practice examples for both units. Once you complete Unit 1 and Unit 4, the assignment
content:
Dear Students,

I have attached the reading material for *Unit 2 and Unit 5*, along with
assignment questions and practice examples for both units.

Once you complete *Unit 1 and Unit 4*, the assignment evaluation will
begin. Therefore, please ensure that you write your assignments regularly.

If you have any queries or concerns, feel free to meet me in *Room 309,
CSPIT*, or communicate via email. I will be happy to assist you.

Best regards,

subject: Fwd: CHARUSAT - Indian Knowledge System - Story Narrating Competition - Invitation for students to participate
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dean FOH <dean.foh@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 3:50 PM Subject: CHARUSAT - Indian Knowledge System - Story Narrating Competition -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dean FOH <dean.foh@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Feb 14, 2025 at 3:50â€¯PM
Subject: CHARUSAT - Indian Knowledge System - Story Narrating Competition -
Invitation for students to participate
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

We are thrilled to invite all the students of CHARUSAT to participate in
the upcoming *Storytelling Competition*, an event designed to celebrate the
power of storytelling and creativity. This is their chance to bring stories
to life through compelling narration, expressive delivery, and engaging
presentation.

Whether they have a story to tell or wish to experience the magic of
storytelling, this competition is an excellent platform to showcase talent
and captivate the audience.

ğŸ“… *Date:* February 21, 2025 (Friday)

ğŸ“ *Venue:* Will be communicated to registered students

All the details regarding rules, judging criteria, and registration are
provided in the *attached brochure*. Kindly go through it, share it with
your students and inform the interested students to register by February
20, 2025.

Students should not miss this wonderful opportunity to refine their
storytelling skills and gain recognition for their talent.

We look forward to an exciting and inspiring event!

For any queries, feel free to reach out to *Dr. Kinjal Bhatia (+91
9033395935). *

Thanking you in anticipation of your positive response,

With regards,

Binit Patel
Bhaskar Pandya


-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421, Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Student Participation in CESD Sessions on 12th & 15th February 2025
snippet: For NSS students. Those who have not attended the CESD workshop. Read trailing mail carefully, and attend sessions as per trailing mail to fulfil minimum requirement. Regards, ---------- Forwarded
content:
For NSS students. Those who have not attended the CESD workshop.
Read trailing mail carefully, and attend sessions as per trailing mail to
fulfil minimum requirement.
Regards,


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CREDP CHARUSAT <head.credp@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 11, 2025 at 1:45â€¯PM
Subject: Mandatory Student Participation in CESD Sessions on 12th & 15th
February 2025
To: Head CE CHARUSAT <hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head Electrical CHARUSAT <
hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC CHARUSAT <hod.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE <
hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
HOD AIML <hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir / Madam,

Namaskaram !

I am writing to seek your support in ensuring the attendance of students (
Those who have not attended CESD workshop )from your department for the two
sessions of the CESD Course, scheduled on 12th and 15th February 2025.
These sessions will feature a series of insightful and impactful
activities, including:

Youth Parliament
Debate Competition
Expert Session on Organ Donation Awareness
Expert Session on Animal Rescue Awareness
Expert Session on Disaster Management
And several other engaging activities
Given the significance of these sessions in fostering critical thinking,
social awareness, and civic responsibility among students, we request you
to strictly mandate their attendance.

Your cooperation in this regard is highly valued, and we appreciate your
efforts in encouraging student engagement. Please do not hesitate to reach
out if you require any further details.

Thank you for your time and support.

Warm Regards,

Dr. Dilip Gosai
CESD Course Coordinator
CHARUSAT


-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421, Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

snippet: Dear Students, We're excited to introduce you to an expert in electrical engineering and power systems â€“ Mr. Hiranya Pathak! With over 20 years of experience in India and the USA, Mr. Pathak has
content:
Dear Students,

Weâ€™re excited to introduce you to an expert in electrical engineering and
power systems â€“ Mr. Hiranya Pathak!

With over 20 years of experience in India and the USA, Mr. Pathak has
worked with top companies like ABB, National Grid, Siemens, and Mitsubishi
(Primetals). He has also published multiple technical papers on power
system design, reliability, and emerging electrical technologies.

He will be delivering an insightful session on:

subject: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE.
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event:
content:
Dear All,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.

Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "*

*Guidelines:*
1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on a drawing
sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.
*Submission Link:* https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7
These can be further modified on the day of presentation [15/02/2025].

2.    Last Extended Date of Entry Submission: 8th February, 2025 [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pen or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the *day of
presentation [Date: 15/02/2025, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building*].
Participants must remain present in *MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building] from 09:15
am to 12:00 pm on 15/02/2025*, Saturday to present their project ideas.
Students may use presentations and poster to demonstrate their project
ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of a maximum 3 students.

6.    You need to submit your poster presentation in hard copy, it's size
should be A3.

7.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate (First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize 500
Rs/-). Others will receive a certificate of participation.

*NOTE : *
Individual entries are also allowed .
For group entries you are free to form a group from any department and any
institute.
Make sure the maximum number of members of the group should not exceed 3 .

For any further query you may please contact student coordinators
( *23CE115 - Priya Pedhadiya (63549 14979)*   and   *23CE022 - Devam
Ghodasara (94264 31542)* ).
-- 
Thanks & Regards.
Priya B Pedhadiya.
@23ce115@charusat.edu.in

subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in â€œ3rd Urja Shaktiâ€: National Level Online Write-Up Competition RGIPT, Jais
snippet: Dear Students, You may participate in the contest as per trailing mail. Regards, ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Urja Shakti <urjashakti@rgipt.ac.in> Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 3:42
content:
Dear Students,
You may participate in the contest as per trailing mail.
Regards,



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Urja Shakti <urjashakti@rgipt.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 3:42â€¯PM
Subject: Invitation for Participation in â€œ3rd Urja Shaktiâ€: National Level
Online Write-Up Competition RGIPT, Jais
To: <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>




Dear Sir/Madam,



Greetings from Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT)!



I am writing this email to invite your institute/college/university to
participate in 3rd â€œUrja Shakti 2025â€, a national level write-up
competition for female Undergraduate Engineering and Postgraduate
Engineering students. Yes, this year the contest is also open for female PG
Engineering students in a separate PG category.  *The winners will be
getting prizes worth Lakhs. Also, UG category winners will have a chance to
win internship at a subject of their choice*. We have scheduled this
competition from 1st February 2025 to 3rd March 2025. As your esteemed
institute is one of the premier organizations working and contributing to
energy sector; we are expecting significant participation that shall bring
out more female innovators and engineers in our society.

A candidate can participate under the following themes:

Ã˜    AI, ML, IoT application in Petroleum industry/ Cyber Security in
Energy Sector /Automation in Energy Sector

Ã˜    Unconventional / Renewable Energy Sources

Ã˜    Waste to Energy/ Zero waste energy

Ã˜    Energy Storage & Utilization/ Grid Modernization

Ã˜    Energy Policies & Climate Changes

Ã˜    Emerging Energy Technologies/ Strategies for CO2 capture and
utilization/ Hydrogen Energy/ Nuclear Energy



*PG category:* 1st: â‚¹40000/-, 2nd: â‚¹30000/- and 3rd: â‚¹20000/-

*UG Category:* 1st : â‚¹30000/-, 2nd : â‚¹20000/- and 3rd : â‚¹10000/-

*Two Consolation Prizes for each category: *â‚¹5000/-



It is an excellent opportunity for participants to share their novel and
innovative ideas in front of experts in the field.



Along with awarding cash prizes for winners, Urja Shakti is also taking
this opportunity to honor one female working professional in the Energy
Sector with â€œUrjashakti Lifetime Achievement Awardâ€.



Let us all be united and contribute towards encouraging the daughters of
India, for a brighter tomorrow.



We will wait for your response and shall be obliged if you honour our
invitation.



For more information, please find the brochure and check website:
https://rgipt.ac.in/urjashakti25/.



Regards

Team Urja Shakti 2025

Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology, Jais, Amethi

An Institute of National Importance established under the act of Parliament

www.rgipt.ac.in



-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421, Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: INFO_STUDENT
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in collaboration with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij, designed to boost your
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology,*

We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in
collaboration with *IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*, designed to boost your skills
and career prospects.

ğŸ”¹ Training Overview

*Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*

   - Month 1: Live interactive sessions with industry experts.
   - Month 2: Hands-on internship projects with expert guidance.

*Industry-Recognized Certifications*

   - Certificate of Completion from IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
   - Internship Certificate verified by Wipro DICE ID and top MNCs.

*Professional Skill Development*

   - Learn Generative AI, Prompt Engineering, and No-Code/Low-Code
   Applications.
   - Attend guest lectures from leaders at Microsoft & Meta.

*Exclusive Benefits*

   - 6-month access to a personalized LMS portal.
   - Placement Assistance through a dedicated career community.
   - 24/7 Mentorship & Doubt-Clearing to keep you on track.

Application Details




* - Application Form: https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9
<https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9>- Referral ID: CHST25 (For CHARUSAT
Students Only)- Application Deadline: 08:00 PM | 05th February 2025 *

*Note: *Today is the final day for registration, students registration
details will be sent to the Training and Placement Cell by EOD. So kindly
fill up the form before the deadline and complete your registration.



*For students already enrolled, please ignore this message.*

Best regards,
*Academic Head*
*LaunchEd Global | IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*

subject: Fwd: US University Graduate Education Fair - @CHARUSAT on 4th FEB 2025
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CDPC CHARUSAT Date: Mon, Feb 3, 2025 at 11:04 AM Subject: US University Graduate Education Fair - @CHARUSAT on 4th FEB 2025 Dear All, Greetings from
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CDPC CHARUSAT
Date: Mon, Feb 3, 2025 at 11:04â€¯AM
Subject: US University Graduate Education Fair - @CHARUSAT on 4th FEB 2025

<https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0?ui=2&ik=5952a72cec&attid=0.1&permmsgid=msg-a:r-4577378780472427793&view=att&disp=safe&realattid=f_m6okuwz10&zw>Dear
All,
Greetings from Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)!!

We invite you to explore the U.S. University Education Fair at our Campus. This
in-person fair is your chance to interact with 15+ reputed and accredited
U.S. Universities, offering a wide array of graduate programs (Masterâ€™s,
Ph.D. programs).

*Fair details: *

*Date : Tuesday, February 04, 2025*

*Time :  10.00 - 12.30 noon*

*Venue : Center Square , **IIIM BUILDING, Charusat University campus,
Changa*


Registration Required:

https://forms.gle/AvMb5rh1WNjKVhq9A


Fairs are an opportunity for you to connect with U.S. higher education
institutions to learn more about study options in the United States.

*Meet the Officials from 14 U.S. Universities :*

   - Governors State University
   - Lewis University
   - Massachusetts College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences [ MCPHS ]
   - Northeastern University
   - San Jose State University
   - The Catholic University of America
   - University of Louisville, College of Business
   - University of Massachusetts Lowell
   - University of Nebraska Lincoln
   - University of Southern California Marshall School of Business
   - University of Wisconsin Milwaukee
   - Wayne State University
   - Worcester Polytechnic Institute
   - ETS INDIA Testing Body [ TOEFL / GRE ]
   - Indo American Education Society


*STUDENT - TO DO LIST BEFORE THE FAIR:*


   1. Research participating Institutes before arriving at the fair event.
   2. Make a list of priority Institutes that you would like to visit
   followed by secondary interests.
   3. Visit booths in that order to ensure you have enough time!
   4. Create a list of questions you would like to ask university
   representatives that are not easily found on the Institute websites.
   5. After visiting a fair booth, write a few notes about your discussion.
   This will help you to remember individual conversations before visiting the
   next booth.
   6. You may also reach out to the Indo American Education Society for any
   guidance & information related to Higher Education in the US.
   7. Visit Institutes not already on your personal interest list time
   permitting. You might be surprised to identify new institutes that are not
   on your radar!

Highlights of the fair:

   -

   Chat one-to-one with U.S. university representatives and get your
   questions answered on programs, application processes and financial aid at
   these universities.
   -

   Collect the latest brochures and course descriptions of universities at
   your convenience during the fair.
   -

   Interact with Indo American Education Society advisers, A Trusted Non
   Profit advising center that provides accurate, current, comprehensive and
   unbiased information on the U.S. university application process.
   -

   Meet with testing organizations and discuss the latest updates on
   testing.



*Registration is done through the below link:*

https://forms.gle/AvMb5rh1WNjKVhq9A


[image: CHARUSAT_USA_Uni_Fair.jpg]


*Prof. Ashwin Makwana, *
Head, *Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*, CHARUSAT
Charotar University of Science & Technology, AT: Changa,
Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.
02697-265213/265123, (M)9408151969


-- 
*Dr. Mihir A. Bhatt*
*Asst. Professor (PhD), *
*Member - IEEE, *
*Member - IEEE Trans. DEIS, *
*Member - IEEE Trans. IAS,*
*Dept. of Electrical Engineering*
*CSPIT - CHARUSAT, Changa*


*Accredited with 'A+' by NAAC - Govt. of India*

--

subject: Opportunity to Join Blockchain Discussion on Bharat Blockchain Network
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging Blockchain Discussion hosted on the Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community. This is a great
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well.

We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging *Blockchain
Discussion* hosted on the *Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community*.
This is a great opportunity for blockchain enthusiasts to expand their
knowledge, interact with like-minded individuals, and showcase their
expertise.
*Discussion Details:*

   - *Format:* A structured discussion (not a formal debate) on a relevant
   blockchain topic.
   - *Topic:* Will be shared upon confirmation of participation.
   - *Preparation Time:* 3 days after topic announcement.
   - *Team Requirement:* 2 teams of at least 4 members each.
   - *Prizes:* Exciting rewards for outstanding contributions!

*Why Participate?*

   - Gain insights into the latest blockchain trends.
   - Engage in meaningful discussions with industry professionals.
   - Enhance your knowledge and critical thinking skills in blockchain
   technology.
   - A chance to win prizes for demonstrating exceptional understanding and
   ideas.

*How to Confirm Your Participation?*

To confirm your participation, please *reply to this email* with your team
details, including:

   - *Team Member Names*
   - *ID Numbers*
   - *Contact Numbers*

We look forward to your participation and an insightful discussion!

Best Regards,

*Shrey Lakhtaria**Dhairya Kanabar*
*Campus Ambassador, IDS/BBN*

-- 


Shrey Lakhtaria

Computer Science Engineering, CSPIT.

<https://github.com/shreylakhtaria>
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/shrey-lakhataria/>
<https://www.instagram.com/shrey7120/>

subject: Fwd: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56 AM Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar Respected
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56â€¯AM
Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar

Respected Madam/Sir,

We would like to inform you that 3030 EKLAVYA is a program for teachers,
students and parents.

The 1st episode, Computing with Soap:
https://www.youtube.com/live/A3-PpOYzXps?si=d7nybVbTAuWEA8AW received 75K
views, 10K assignment submission, 19 min avg watch time.

*Contains solving computational problems - optimum metro-rail network,
Fastest descent problem posed by Galileo, analysed by Newton, Fermat  -
Calculus of Variations, Numerical Methods, optimization and nature of the
universe, cell structures & divisions using bubbles.*

The link of the Next Episode: *History of Time & Clock (2 Feb, Sunday 4
PM): *https://www.youtube.com/live/S6RR7sYtLzE?si=XWq3W-z9EQSiwKfA

*Link for Registration:* https://eklavya.iitgandhinagar.ac.in/

We request you to please disseminate the link among your team and also
encourage your team of faculty, students to watch the innovative programme.

*Regards*

*Dr. Amit Dutta, *
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,**New Delhi- 110070, Ph : 011-29581117*

-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: Kanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship for the Students for the Academic year (2024-25) Undergraduate Program of CSPIT
snippet: Dear Students, We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely â€œKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of
content:
Dear Students,



We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new
Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely â€œKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel
Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of  Faculty of Engineering and
Technology (B.Tech., CSPIT) for the academic year 2024-25.


Please find notice and application form for your ready reference.



 Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:



v  *The Scholarship is available for **Charotar Moti Sattavis Patidar Samaj
Student Only.*

v  The Students of whose results are more than 75 Percentile in 12th
Standard (for First Year Student) and 7.5 CGPA without Backlog (for 2nd, 3rd &
4th year student) whose yearly family income is not more than Rs. 6.5 lacs
will be eligible to apply

v  *The Scholarship will be awarded to :*



*Program*

*Scholarship Amount in Rs. (per year)*

*No. of Students who will get benefit every year*

*First Year*

*Second Year*

*Third Year*

*Fourth Year*

*CSPIT (B.Tech.)*

*35000*

*3*

*2*

*3*

*0*



v  To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.50 CGPA or above at the end of every Year without a backlog.



v  In case, a student will not score a minimum 7.50 CGPA in a consecutive
Year, then a scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student.



v  Students receiving two or more scholarships (e.g. MYSY) and Students
admitted under Tuition Fees waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to apply.




*The filled forms for the scholarship submitted to : **Mr. Yatin Talati,
Building A6 , Room No.101, CSPIT  Admin Office.*


*Last* *Date of Submission of Form: 15.02.2025*



 **Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date. *

--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade â€œA+â€ by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

--

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: Wipro Authorized Training and Internship & Placement Program
snippet: Dear Student, [Referral Code:- KS15] Greetings from Krutanic Solutions! As part of the ongoing Wipro Training and Internship Campaign on your campus, we want to remind you that today is the last day to
content:
*Dear Student,*

*[Referral Code:- KS15]*

Greetings from Krutanic Solutions!

As part of the ongoing Wipro Training and Internship Campaign on your
campus, we want to remind you that *today is the last day to register*.

We are thrilled to collaborate with top multinational companies,
including *IBM,
Microsoft, Wipro, Deloitte, Cognizant, Infosys, Oracle, TCS, PwC, J.P.
Morgan, Amazon, Accenture, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra,* and many more.

This program offers a *3-month online Training, Internship, and Placement
Assistance Program*, guided by industry experts with 10+ years of
experience.

*Why Join?*

   - Comprehensive training with live interactive sessions.
   - Hands-on projects to apply your knowledge.
   - Placement assistance, including mock interviews and resume-building
   guidance.
   - Certification of completion and Letter of Recommendation (LOR) for job
   references.

*Register Here:* https://forms.gle/H2hN3btxRdBCLQv4A

   - Weekly sessions (Mondayâ€“Friday) via Zoom or Google Meet.

ğŸ”¹ *Month 2: Internship & Projects*

   - Gain real-world experience through hands-on projects.
   - Minor Project (7 days) and Major Project (23 days) with expert
   guidance.

ğŸ”¹ *Month 3: Placement Assistance*

   - Mock interviews, group discussions, and resume-building sessions.
   - Focused personality development and communication skill enhancement.

*Certificates Provided*
âœ” Internship Certificate (AICTE & ISO Certified).
âœ” Training Completion Certificate.
âœ” Letter of Recommendation (LOR) from MNCs.
âœ” Excellence Certificate for top performers.

*Additional Benefits*

   - Guidance from professionals working in reputed organizations like IBM,
   Microsoft, TCS, and more.
   - Access to real-time projects to strengthen your resume.
   - Placement support and opportunities to connect with leading recruiters.

*Contact Information*
Sanket Savita

snippet: Do you want to be in the TOP 1%? The AIESEC Influence! Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience. Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted about AIESEC. DHL Group
content:
[image: image]



[image: image]



Do you want to be in the TOP 1%?



[image: image]
The AIESEC Influence!

Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience.

Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted
about AIESEC.
[image: image]
DHL Group
and many more...

internship at DHL Group with a stipend of Rs.40,000/month.

Get a fee waiver in top colleges affiliated with AIESEC, if you have AIESEC
Experience.

<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>

strengthen your resume!
Watch this Video
<https://www.instagram.com/p/BsaicuVl6HQ/?igsh=MXRkODJzemRpMmpoMA%3D%3D&img_index=1>

Help us get the Exchange Participant have the smoothest experience! Let's
foster Global Connections!

Marketing

Let's generate the finest leads! Learn more about marketing and improve
your public speaking skills!
[image: image]
Business Development

your public speaking skills!


REGISTER HERE!

AIESEC is more than an organisationâ€”it's a global movement of young leaders
driving impactful change. Through leadership development and cross-cultural
exchanges, AIESEC empowers you to unlock your potential, gain life-changing
experiences, and make a difference in the world. Join us to lead, grow, and
shape a better future!

subject: Join Indiaâ€™s Biggest Study Abroad Expo â€“ Register Now!
snippet: Dear Students We are excited to invite you to India's Biggest Study Abroad Expo, an exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact directly with university representatives
content:
Dear Students

We are excited to invite you to *Indiaâ€™s Biggest Study Abroad Expo*, an
exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact
directly with university representatives from *Australia* and *Canada*.

*Event Details:*
ğŸ“… *Date:* Monday, 20th January
â° *Time:* 11:00 AM â€“ 4:00 PM
ğŸ“ *Venue:* Grand Mercure, Vadodara

*Why You Should Attend:*

   - *Direct Access to World-Class Institutions*: Meet representatives
from *130+
   universities* to explore your academic options and scholarships.
   - *Scholarship Opportunities*: Learn how 11,000+ students secured
   scholarships last year and how *you* could be next.
   - *On-the-Spot IELTS Booking*: Book your IELTS test and receive access
   to free preparation materials.
   - *Education Loan Assistance*: Get guidance on securing education loans
   up to â‚¹3 crore and save up to â‚¹1 lakh.

We understand you may have commitments to sports or cultural events, so we
kindly request that you register only if you can ensure your confirmed
participation.

*How to Register:*
Scan the QR code on the poster or click here
<https://forms.gle/8qRf6dHQNqLTBfe39> to secure your spot. Spaces are
limited, and registrations open till 4:00 PM today.)
[image: adobe-express-qr-code (7).png]

We look forward to helping you take the first step toward your global
education journey. Please feel free to reach out to us at +91 9998380041 if
you have any questions.

Warm regards,

*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: LAUNCHED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY INTERNSHIP (BOOTCAMP) EXCLUSIVE OPPURTUNITY ALERT
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHARUSAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT BOMBAY's AVENUES: a 2-Month Training and Internship Program featuring
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*
*CHARUSAT Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
BOMBAY's AVENUES*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
shortlisted you will receive a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after the Registration Process.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week after 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* in alliance with Avenues IIT BOMBAY
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Donâ€™t miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic *
*CounselorLaunchED Avenues IIT BOMBAY*

*Dear Students,*

*Greetings from CHARUSAT!*

We are delighted to invite you to the *Community Engagement and Sustainable
Development (CESD) Workshop Mode Course*, scheduled from *January 16th to
22nd, 2025*, from *9:00 AM to 12:00 Noon daily*.

As a *two-credit course* that you opted for at the beginning of the *academic
year 2024â€“25* (in lieu of Sports and Physical Training*), attendance and
active participation in this program are compulsory. Please note that no
post-workshop remedies will be provided.*

*Key Details: Workshop Schedule*

*Morning Sessions (On-Campus):*

   - *Dates:* January 16â€“22, 2025
   - *Time:* 9:00 AM â€“ 12:00 Noon
   - *Venue:* RPCP Auditorium, First Floor, Ramanbhai Patel College of
   Pharmacy
   - *Activities:* Interactive discussions, knowledge-sharing sessions, and
   engaging activities.

*Field Visits (Hands-On Experience):*

   - *Conducted in the week following the workshop.*
   - Location: Nearby villages for practical exposure to community
   engagement and sustainable development activities.

This program is designed to blend *theoretical knowledge* with *practical
experience*, equipping you with a deeper understanding of community
challenges and sustainable practices. We encourage you to participate
actively in both the *on-campus sessions* and *field visits* to maximize
your learning and contribute meaningfully to the communities you engage
with.

Upon successful completion of this workshop, *two credits* will be awarded
on your mark sheet.

For any questions or further clarification, feel free to contact us at *98252
93046*.

We look forward to your enthusiastic participation!

Warm regards,
*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
*Course Coordinator, CESD -CUUV101*
*CHARUSAT*
*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Head
CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

Charotar University of Science & Technology
CHARUSAT Campus - Changa

<http://www.charusat.ac.in/>


-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421, Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

subject: Course Information and Evaluation Details for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject coordinator for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102). I would like to share with you the course evaluation
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject
coordinator for *Engineering
Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)*. I would like to share with you the
course evaluation structure and important dates.
*Course Evaluation Structure*

The total marks for the course are *100*, divided as follows:

   -

   *50 Marks â€“ Internal Examination*
   - *20 Marks* for mid-term exams
      - *10 Marks* for two online quizzes (*5 marks each*)
      - *10 Marks* for assignments
      - *10 Marks* for class tests
   -

   *50 Marks â€“ External Examination *

*Important Dates (Tentative)*

   1. *First Quiz:* 10th March 2025
   2. *Second Quiz:* 1st May 2025
   3. *Class Test:* Last week of April 2025

I am attaching the following materials to help you prepare for the course:

   - Reading materials for *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Assignment examples for  *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Practice examples   *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Complete classwork examples

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me via email.

Enjoy your mini vacation, and I look forward to seeing you in class!

Best regards,

*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

subject: LaunchED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits. It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought to you in partnership with IIT
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT  Students,*

I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits.

It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought
to you in partnership with *IIT Bombay's Avenues*: a *two-month Training
and Internship Program*. This distinguished program will grant certificates
from reputable multinational organizations in a variety of fields, further
enhancing your academic and professional credentials.



Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Eligibility and Application:*

We extend an invitation to *shortlisted students* from all departments to
apply for this esteemed program. Should any of your fellow students not
have received this communication, we kindly ask that you forward it to them.

Those who wish to participate are required to submit their applications at
the earliest convenience. Should you be shortlisted, a member of our
esteemed HR team will reach out to you directly.

*Submit Your Application*
*Program Details:**Month 1: Training*

   - Participate in live, expert-led sessions and lectures.
   - Login details shall be provided subsequent to your registration.

*Month 2: Internship*

   - Embark upon a hands-on internship, where you shall work on live
   projects under the tutelage of seasoned professionals.
   - *Project Breakdown:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete ten distinct assignments under
      the guidance of your mentor.
      - *Capstone Group Project:* Collaborate with fellow interns on a
      capstone project, with each member assuming a specific role. All required
      resources shall be furnished by the organization.

*Learning Structure:*

   - *Blended Learning:* You will have access to recorded sessions and the
   opportunity to attend live sessions for doubt resolution every weekend.
   - *Live Mentor-Led Sessions:* Engage in live Zoom classes, held two to
   three times a week after 6:30 PM. These sessions will be recorded for
   future reference. Furthermore, you shall have access to our *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for a period of six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon successful completion of the program, students will be awarded:

   - A *Certificate of Completion*, in association with *Avenues IIT Bombay*
   .
   - *Verified Certificates* via Wipro Dice ID.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from renowned multinational
   companies.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and access to a growing professional
   network.
   - Specialized training in *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - A curriculum centered on *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with distinguished industry leaders.
   - *Personalized Mentorship*, designed to guide and support you
   throughout your career journey.

*A Notable Opportunity Awaits:*

This is indeed an exceptional opportunity for those who wish to broaden
their knowledge and enhance their professional expertise. We encourage all
interested students to submit their applications promptly to secure a
position in this distinguished program.


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Program Overview:*


With warm regards and best wishes for your continued success,
*Akash Kapoor*
Senior Academic Counselor
*LaunchED Avenues IIT Bombay*

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 1
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill â€” the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/a31db465432dd089f9e892e8753dafb6c5467911]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL â€” the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHATâ€™S INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE â€“ Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION â€“ Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS â€“ Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE â€“ Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE â€“ Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS â€“ Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

subject: Lecture Adjustment of MSUD102 (Niru Patel) Notification
snippet: Dear Students, As per the timetable, the scheduled lecture for Wednesday (8/1/2024) will be rescheduled to Monday next week, ie, 6/1/2024. The lecture will be conducted from 1:10 pm to 2:10 pm in
content:
Dear Students,

As per the timetable, the scheduled lecture for Wednesday (8/1/2024) will
be rescheduled to Monday next week, i.e., 6/1/2024. The lecture will be
conducted from 1:10 p.m. to 2:10 p.m. in Classroom No. 239.


Thanks & Regards


Dr. Niru C. Patel

Assistant  Professor,

Department of Mathematical Sciences,

Faculty of Science,

Charotar University of Science & Technology

CHARUSAT Campus

CHANGA,

TA. PETLAD

DIST. ANAND-388421 (GUJARAT)

INDIA

Email ID: nirupatel.maths@charusat.ac.in <nirupatel.matcs@charusat.ac.in>

--

subject: Live Streaming of 14áµ—Ê° Convocation Ceremony | CHARUSAT
snippet: Convocation 2025 Dear All, We are happy to inform you that the 14th Convocation Ceremony of CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is a special milestone as we celebrate
content:
[Convocation 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]


DEAR ALL,

We are happy to inform you that the 14TH CONVOCATION CEREMONY OF
CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is
a special milestone as we celebrate 25 GLORIOUS YEARS OF ACADEMIC
EXCELLENCE.

Click here to Watch the Ceremony Live
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/280d7aa3c6ab2dce0e4b5ea1d43afda06924cd1e]
DATE: January 4, 2025 | TIME: 5 pm onwards
We invite you to join us virtually and participate in this momentous
occasion. The ceremony will feature the conferment of degrees, awards,
and recognition of our students' outstandingvements.

Please feel free to share the link with your family and friends who
may be interested in watching the ceremony.

We look forward to your virtual presence!

[CHARUSAT Full-Length Image]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]

subject: Fwd: SPOURAL'25 Sports Events - Important Information
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sports CHARUSAT <sports.officer@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, 2 Jan 2025 at 8:25 PM Subject: SPOURAL'25 Sports Events - Dear All, Greetings of the
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sports CHARUSAT <sports.officer@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 2 Jan 2025 at 8:25â€¯PM
Subject: SPOURAL'25 Sports Events -
Dear All,

Greetings of the Season!

We are excited to announce the upcoming SPOURAL'25 Sports Events!

Hereby, we are sharing the following documents for SPOURAL' 25 Sports
Events:

   1. SPOURAL'25 Calendar/Schedule.
   2. Rule Book for Sports Events
   3. Faculty and Student Teams Allotment
   4. Fixtures of student games

*NOTE:*


   - *The fixtures for faculty sports will be released soon. Please stay
   tuned for further updates.*
   - *The fixtures of students for Badminton, Table Tennis and Chess will
   be declared on the spot.*

All council coordinators are requested to inform all students and faculties
of their respective Departments/Institutes about the attached information.

Any changes in the above information will be informed to you in advance.
Further details for other games will be shared soon.

In case of any queries, please contact the university sports section.

We encourage all students and faculty to participate actively in these
exciting events!

Thank you for your constant support.

*Dr.Pritesh Patel*
-- 
Assistant Director of Physical Education and Sports
CHARUSAT Physical Education and Sports Section
(A constituent of CHARUSAT)
*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC, GOI*
*Accredited with Centre of Excellence by GOG*
Landline No: 02697-265036
Mobile : -- 97142 96999

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Patel <priteshpatel.sports@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Jan 2, 2025 at 4:19 PM Subject: Fwd: Reschedule exam of Physical education and sports
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pritesh Patel <priteshpatel.sports@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Jan 2, 2025 at 4:19â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: Reschedule exam of Physical education and sports CUVV102
To: Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <
hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Head Civil CHARUSAT <

<hod.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Principal PDPIAS CHARUSAT <

Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <
hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean FCA CHARUSAT <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FAS CHARUSAT <dean.fas@charusat.ac.in>, Dean
FMS CHARUSAT <dean.fms@charusat.ac.in>



Respcted sir/ Madam ,

This email is to inform you that several students were absent from the
Physical Education and Sports CUVV102 exam held on . A list of the absent
students is attached for your reference.

In light of this, we have decided to reschedule the exam for *January 9,
2025, at 10:00 AM* in the morning.

We kindly request all Heads of Departments to inform their respective
students about this rescheduling.

For any further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to
contact the Sports Office

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

*Sincerely,*


-- 

*Dr.Pritesh Patel*
*Assistant Director of Physical Education and Sports*

subject: Whistle Blower Policy
snippet: To, All CHARUSAT Family members, The CHARUSAT university believes in upholding high standards of integrity and ethical behaviour and strives to confirm in all its actions to this core value. The
content:
To,
All CHARUSAT Family members,

The CHARUSAT university believes in upholding high standards of integrity
and ethical behaviour and strives to confirm in all its actions to this
core value. The university is engaged with several stakeholders, each being
critical in helping the university to achieve its vision and mission.
Employees are expected to observe high morals by following right conduct
with honesty and that too without any fear.



In view that a policy for â€œWhistle Blowerâ€ is prepared and circulated for
the information of all the employees, students and stakeholders of the
university.



The purpose of the Whistle Blowing is to correct something wrong or illegal
and not to serve any personal advancement i.e it has to be done in good
faith and for the betterment of the functioning of the university (i.e
academic and administrative).

 The Whistle Blower policy is attached herewith for information of all the
CHARUSAT family members.


Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421, Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

--

Dear Students,

This mail is to inform you that the final selection round of* Rass Garba,
Dance (Classical, Group and Solo), Fashion Show and Mr. & Ms. CHARUSAT* is
going to be held on* 1st January 2025, Wednesday.*

The timings of the same are as follows:
*Rass-Garba: 12:30 pm*
*Dance: 12:30 pm*
*Fashion Show: To be announced a day prior*

prior to the event.*

groups beforehand.

Hoping to see maximum participation and enthusiasm for the selections.

Regards.

subject: Fwd: IMP: Continuous and Comprehensive Evaluation (CCE) for B.Tech. Second Semester
snippet: Dear Students Kindly note that the following numerals have been set for Therory (sessional component) (50 marks) & Term Work (Term work) (25 marks) of course BCME (MEUC102) for the 2024-25 batch (
content:
Dear Students

Kindly note that the following numerals have been set for Therory
(sessional component) (50 marks) & Term Work (Term work) (25 marks) of
course BCME (MEUC102) for the 2024-25 batch (ME/CL/EE).

Theory component   (Out of 50)
Component Marks
Midterm exam 20
CCE Home Assignment 15
Quiz 15
Total 50
Lab component   (Out of 25)
Component Marks
CCE Lab Work 10
Poster Competition/ Presentation 10
Attendance 5
Total 25
*Students should have minimum performance (36% out of 50 marks) in
the Continuous Assessment to appear in the end-semester university
examination.  *

The end semester theory exam and Practical Viva will be of 50 marks and 25
Marks, respectively.

Thank you.

Best Regards,



Dr. Abhishek Swarnkar (M.Tech.| PhD)

Assistant Professor

Charotar University of Science & Technology

+91 90992 23998 | abhishekswarnkar.me@charusat.ac.in

subject: STEP TALK on Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies
snippet: We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by IEEE CSPIT SB in collaboration with the IEEE Gujarat Section. Join us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded
content:
We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session,
organized by *IEEE
CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join us to
explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in driving
smart technologies.


*Event Details:*

â€¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

â€¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

â€¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

â€¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

â€¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)


*Session Highlights:*

â€¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts, and
evolution.

â€¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.

â€¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
monitoring.

â€¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
and scalability.

â€¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.

â€¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.



*About the Speaker:*

*Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
University, UniversitÃ© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
significantly to military and space application research. She is a
published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
IEEE NTC Chapter.


We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a leader
in the field.


*Fill out the google form to book your seat :*

https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9


Looking forward to your presence!

IEEE CSPIT Student Branch

subject: Offer for the CHARUSAT Girl Students to watch 31st (2024) Gujarati Movie for free
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '31st (2024)" has been released in theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a girl in Ahmedabad.
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,



Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '*31st (2024)*" has been released in
theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a
girl in Ahmedabad. You can get more information about the film from online
sources.



The producer of the movie has extended the Free Movie Review for *CHARUSAT
Girl Students*. The girl students currently pursuing their studies at
CHARUSAT will get a *free entry in the theatres* after showing her student
I-Card, issued by CHARUSAT, at the ticket counter of the theatre.



Girl students and Lady Faculty members can avail the offer at *Shaan Cinema
â€“ Anand* and *Lux Cinema - Petlad* till December 28, 2024. The offer is
limited to the scheduled shows of the film. The entry is subject to the
availability of seats. One ticket will be issued for one I-card. The offer
is limited for the film viewing only, other facilities are not the part of
this scheme.



We wish the maximum number of students to avail this offer.



Thank you.




PS: The right of the entry is reserved by the cinema owner.


With regards,
Regards,
Convener/ Co-convener,
ULSC-CHARUSAT.

--

subject: Canada Day by IDP â€“ A Unique Study Abroad Opportunity
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming "Canada Day by IDP" event, exclusively
content:
Dear Students,



We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain
valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming *"Canada Day
by IDP"* event, exclusively hosted for you at CHARUSAT University in
collaboration with IDP Education.



This event is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of
the opportunities that await in Canada and address common misconceptions
about studying there. Highlights of the event include:



Â·  *Expert Talk:* "Breaking the Myths about the Present Scenario of
Studying in Canada and Fact-Checking the Enormous Opportunities Awaiting in
Canada."



Â·  *One-on-One Counseling:* Get personalized guidance and profile
assessments from IDP's Canada team experts.



Â·  *On-the-Spot Solutions:* Address your queries directly with experienced
counselors.



*Event Details:*

Â·  *Date:* Tuesday, December 31, 2024

Â·  *Time:* 11:00 AM â€“ 4:00 PM

Â·  *Venue:* IIIM Auditorium, CHARUSAT University Campus

Â·  *Registration Link:* Register Here
<https://forms.gle/sNBS7gZavGohxxtG8> (Please
use your CHARUSAT email ID to register.)



This is a remarkable opportunity to explore the possibilities of studying
in Canada and receive tailored advice for the academic journey. We
encourage you to register and make the most of this exclusive event.



Seats are limited, so please register as soon as you can to secure your
participation.



If you have any questions, please get in touch with Dr. Vijay Makwana at
+91 99983 80041.




Thanks & Regards,

*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

snippet: Dear all (The students listed in the Table below), You were absent for the viva of CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics on 20/12/2024, and you have not submitted your TW despite multiple reminders. Based on
content:
Dear all (The students listed in the Table below),

You were absent for the viva of CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics on
20/12/2024, and you have not submitted your TW despite multiple reminders.
Based on the communication with Ankur sir and You on 20/12/2024 at 4:30pm ,
your viva has been rescheduled for today (21/12/2024) at 9:00 am in the HOD
EE cabin, but only three students are coming out of eight without
completion of their TW.

*This is your final reminder to submit the completed Term Work along with
five experiments (SUBJECT Engineering Mechanics) of your choice on separate
pages for your Viva.* *The Viva is rescheduled for 23/12/2024 at 10:30 am
in Room No 528 B, as you agreed in the presence of the EE HOD*. If you are
absent or fail to submit the TW and five experiments at that time, *I will
mark you as "Absent" in your Practical TW and Practical Viva components.*

subject: Successful Blood Donation Camp â€“ A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family
snippet: Successful Blood Donation Camp â€“ A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp held on December 20th, 2024
content:
* Successful Blood Donation Camp â€“ A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT
Family*

Dear CHARUSAT Family,

We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp
held on December 20th, 2024. This event was made possible thanks to the
unwavering dedication of our entire CHARUSAT Family.

A special mention goes to *the student team*, whose active participation
and enthusiasm played a pivotal role in making this life-saving initiative
a reality. Their commitment to service and compassion truly reflects the
core values of our university.

For your reference, we have attached *the list of student participants *along
with *some glimpses of the event*.

Such events are a testament to the strong spirit of collaboration at
CHARUSAT. Your encouragement and involvement are key to inspiring us to
organize more impactful activities in the future.

We are grateful for your continued support and look forward to your
participation in future endeavors.

Together, letâ€™s continue to make a meaningful difference in society and
strengthen our commitment to community service.


---Thanks & Regards---
Mr. Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit
CHARUSAT, Changa 388421

--

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY (GUJRAT) Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-Month Training and Internship
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY(GUJRAT)Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP :*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE
Jahnavi rajput  1 st Year GRAPHICS DESIGN CHARUSAT
Maitra shah  1 st Year FINANCE CHARUSAT
Goyani Tisha Vinubhai  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT

Daksh Delawala  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Milind Vinayak Patil  2 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Roht Eknath Wagh  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
OM VILAS MAHALLE  1 st Year APP DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Sanket Kailas Garudkar 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Sarthak Rajeshkumar  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Maheshwari Saumil Dineshkumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Bhatt xama dharmendra Kumar  1 st Year IOT + ROBOTICS (HARDWARE KIT)
CHARUSAT
Patel Rudra Yatin  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Taksh 1 st Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Gohel Rohan Sandipbhai 3 rd Year VLSI CHARUSAT
JAIVIN TRIVEDI  1 st Year HYBRID ELECTRIC VECHILES CHARUSAT
Tushar Makhnan 1 st Year DIGITAL MARKETING CHARUSAT
Ritik Kumar  1 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Harsh Singh  1 st Year ROBOTICS CHARUSAT
Sravan Kumar 1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE) CHARUSAT
Dhruv Pawar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Utsav Dave 1 st Year EMBEDDED SYSTEM CHARUSAT
Suhanee Yadav 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Kashish Rakeshkumar  1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Rudra Panchal  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
Sutariya Shreyansh Vikaskumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Preya Dhangar  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Tolat Mahek Rajeshbhai 3 rd Year Android App Development CHARUSAT
* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Donâ€™t miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

subject: Request for Donors â€“ 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangal Baa (àª®àª‚àª—àª² àª¬àª¾ àª¨à«€ àªªà«àª£à«àª¯àª¤àª¿àª¥àª¿ àª¨àª¿àª®àª¿àª¤à«‡)
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Greetings We are pleased to announce that the 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangla Baa (àª®àª‚àª—àª²àª¾ àª¬àª¾ àª¨à«€ àªªà«àª£à«àª¯àª¤àª¿àª¥àª¿ àª¨àª¿àª®àª¿àª¤à«‡) is scheduled to be held on 20th December 2024
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,*

Greetings

We are pleased to announce that the *10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of
Mangla Baa (*àª®àª‚àª—àª²àª¾ àª¬àª¾ àª¨à«€ àªªà«àª£à«àª¯àª¤àª¿àª¥àª¿ àª¨àª¿àª®àª¿àª¤à«‡) is scheduled to be held on *20th
December 2024*, from *08:00 AM to 04:00 PM* at *"AASTHA," Indukaka Marg,
Vallabh Vidyanagar*.

To ensure the success of this noble cause, we humbly request All Faculty
Members, Staff Members and Students For kind support in Blood Donation.
Kindly *fill out the attached Registration form* to confirm participation.
We are expecting a Participation of at least * Minimum 10 Members per
department/Institute* to make this event a success.

Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK3xjEBzWG-Op23zkYgo6d8fNl-Mv9AC7FCApND6Ble1-AuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

For more details, please refer to the *attached brochure*.

   - Reporting Time at Central Lawn on 20/12/2024 : 09:10 AM on Sharp


   - Transportation Will Provided by CHARUSAT.
   - Refreshment will Provided by the Organizer.

Your small act of kindness can make a big difference in saving lives. Letâ€™s
unite and *be heroes* by promoting the spirit of donation and service.

*P.S.: @Counselors Please Pass this Information to Students Via **WhatsApp*
*Group.*

Thank you for your cooperation and support!

--

Warm Regards,
Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit.

--

subject: Fwd: NPTEL: Exam Registration is open now for Jan 2025 courses!
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: <onlinecourses@nptel.iitm.ac.in> Date: Tue, Dec 17, 2024 at 12:43 PM Subject: NPTEL: Exam Registration is open now for Jan 2025 courses! To: <noc25
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <onlinecourses@nptel.iitm.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Dec 17, 2024 at 12:43â€¯PM
Subject: NPTEL: Exam Registration is open now for Jan 2025 courses!
To: <noc25-ee87-announce@nptel.iitm.ac.in>


Dear Learner,

Here is the much-awaited announcement on registering for the Jan 2025 NPTEL
course certification exam.


1. The registration for the certification exam is open only to those
learners who have enrolled in the course.

2. If you want to register for the exam for this course, login here using
the same email id which you had used to enroll to the course in Swayam
portal. Please note that Assignments submitted through the exam registered
email id ALONE will be taken into consideration towards final consolidated
score & certification.

3. Date of exam: May 04, 2025

CLICK HERE
<https://u3447072.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.KVe6xeK12Gy7P9NKD6c-2FfHe51tX5-2F9DCvwntyEH8YeAtWZli3jZg4bjXTZbpqegkQdp1bRHCmCTAs9Sgj2F6P2GTBVOYFBb8GYEkkwuFKxM-3DTVXR_LPmeYAeGTeLjWf-2BB6gF4TergRc9U-2BbF2jxFBGe3KLd-2F27y44FX3LamaPoUnNjuzOrvKB8HTfq50ihWNn-2B9BzGgyi3RSeac0dKCKfBcbqyZqhosPTxhT1BFexLsjTkgsZai2HL5doSb-2Frh7SM2Bvpxsom0z1TyUXJdogdAkflhSRlPJD8tQU0HLtP4spvWfg9Vh3ukIQO9q6U7t5iE73SinesPiwZEl69vbumGDZYdno-3D>
to register for the exam.

Choose from the Cities where exam will be conducted: Exam Cities
<https://u3447072.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.KVe6xeK12Gy7P9NKD6c-2FfFnKbHR5Is-2F55gv-2FxyB4Q4LVe5HGpnRTINFgtfjML8jRoLgcLSgOPKTZGSbgOlQ4joxqzOnAuWh-2BnTu1VE9Ypwu9REeRrIjsg9F6Qrwpmx8p6gktE8E98WcbrmCnIYemF2jCmoRk2zBi7yjC5fKwm7Lggx7pI1oOZpJWLW6j2MzfAziW_LPmeYAeGTeLjWf-2BB6gF4TergRc9U-2BbF2jxFBGe3KLd-2F27y44FX3LamaPoUnNjuzOrvKB8HTfq50ihWNn-2B9BzGnEuPFg-2BObLCFdvIFuO8Uu0ibLnhyr-2FIPRL9DHbQ-2Ft1B3p7r-2FYdRE8A2B2npJJuDud1-2BIfbkl7Sh5DHeACo8Bm3TPUGL1OHyqbUp6fc07b-2FcRLCqTCAOyjkfL2N66G3owSRHxBfjXmE33PU1k586Ljc-3D>

4. Exam fees:

If you register for the exam and pay before Feb 24, 2025 - 5:00 PM, Exam
fees will be Rs. 1000/- per exam.

5. 50% fee waiver for the following categories:

Students belonging to the SC/ST category: please select Yes for the SC/ST
option and upload the correct Community certificate.

Students belonging to the PwD category with more than 40% disability:
please select Yes for the option and upload the relevant Disability
certificate.

6. Last date for exam registration: Feb 28, 2025 - 5:00 PM (Friday).

7. Between Feb 24, 2025 - 5:00 PM & Feb 28, 2025 - 5:00 PM late fee will be
applicable.

8. Mode of payment: Online payment - debit card/credit card/net
banking/UPI.

9. HALL TICKET:

The hall ticket will be available for download tentatively by 2 weeks prior
to the exam date. We will confirm the same through an announcement once it
is published.

10. FOR CANDIDATES WHO WOULD LIKE TO WRITE MORE THAN 1 COURSE EXAM:- you
can add or delete courses and pay separately â€“ till the date when the exam
form closes. Same day of exam â€“ you can write exams for 2 courses in the 2
sessions. Same exam center will be allocated for both the sessions.

11. Data changes:

Last date for data changes: Feb 28, 2025 - 5:00 PM:

We will charge an additional fee of Rs. 200 to make any changes related to
name, DOB, photo, signature, SC/ST and PWD certificates after the last date
of data changes.

The following 6 fields can be changed (until the form closes) ONLY when
there are NO courses in the course cart. And you will be able to edit those
fields only if you: -

REMOVE unpaid courses from the cart And/or - CANCEL paid courses

1. Do you come under the SC/ST category? *

2. SC/ST Proof

3. Are you a person with disabilities? *

4. Are you a person with disabilities above 40%?

5. Disabilities Proof

6. What is your role?

Note: Once you remove or cancel a course, you will be able to edit these
fields immediately.

But, for canceled courses, refund of fees will be initiated only after 2
weeks.

12. LAST DATE FOR CANCELING EXAMS and getting a refund: Feb 28, 2025 - 5:00
PM

13. Click here to view Timeline and Guideline : Guideline
<https://u3447072.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.KVe6xeK12Gy7P9NKD6c-2FfFnKbHR5Is-2F55gv-2FxyB4Q4IuTbqUjuqlcDbL9CfgNWlS4mEox6Gx3hVIbYPJ7kUewjH12HvTtI6e94OmWPam1ztY6jolIHWsEOFXrlGKVVK40ipHCF84b95Mb6mL7-2FVT-2BSQupkkhQVEHOvY1VZitGMLGRRibEmFIzqMFk4nhPy0iyopd_LPmeYAeGTeLjWf-2BB6gF4TergRc9U-2BbF2jxFBGe3KLd-2F27y44FX3LamaPoUnNjuzOrvKB8HTfq50ihWNn-2B9BzGsC73jyjE-2BxYht4tiUhLOwtt-2FeDO43yux6xSVXp0-2FBzfOwsGG1ZEj6XM9sQHpz3az1ddlE2iRE-2FtCR1eybi2bULsBVj-2F2Av22O1op6VgXakUSseElKYKxslbXY4IoV1A0wnXptYYG4l-2FNQYtpnOxL2Q-3D>

Domain Certification

Domain Certification helps learners to gain expertise in a specific
Area/Domain. This can be helpful for learners who wish to work in a
particular area as part of their job or research or for those appearing for
some competitive exam or becoming job ready or specialising in an area of
study.



Every domain will comprise Core courses and Elective courses. Once a
learner completes the requisite courses as per the mentioned criteria, you
will receive a Domain Certificate showcasing your scores and the domain of
expertise. Kindly refer to the following link for the list of courses
available under each domain: https://nptel.ac.in/domains
<https://u3447072.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.KVe6xeK12Gy7P9NKD6c-2FfANRFZaEssB51a-2BQnXhWX1qaO8Pcc8-2FK8y6XfVbXGe2vTO8k_LPmeYAeGTeLjWf-2BB6gF4TergRc9U-2BbF2jxFBGe3KLd-2F27y44FX3LamaPoUnNjuzOrvKB8HTfq50ihWNn-2B9BzGhp67e3tdBnky98hHpfixmOba2LNXzz4NdJjgaSsDBBPJ7d9LNv-2F2JAO-2FQ9ju9La4B4ePr8OxHIHT-2BLkrS47ykbwT3kqxxBEyCnh2-2BhjxRrKEAFOTn-2FEeRASWjZBkkYGEgt5KMFS3nVPH-2BNgC7HY12U-3D>

Outside India Candidates

Candidates who are residing outside India may also fill the exam form and
pay the fees. Mode of exam and other details will be communicated to you
separately.

Thanks & Regards,

NPTEL TEAM

--

subject: Your valuable feedback on teachers: E-Governance
snippet: Dear Students, I hope this email finds you well. As the semester comes to a close, we are conducting the Teacher Feedback process to understand your experiences and gather your insights. This feedback
content:
Dear Students,

I hope this email finds you well.

As the semester comes to a close, we are conducting the Teacher Feedback
process to understand your experiences and gather your insights. This
feedback is an important tool for fostering improvement and excellence in
teaching and learning.

By sharing your honest opinions on aspects like teaching effectiveness,
punctuality, support provided to students, and evaluation practices, you
contribute to:

   1. Helping teachers identify areas for growth and enhance their teaching
   strategies.
   2. Ensuring that future teaching practices align better with your needs
   and expectations.

Your feedback is *completely confidential*. We value your input and
encourage you to provide thoughtful, constructive responses to help us
continue improving.

The feedback is now active on your E-Governance. You can fill out the
feedback. Also, you can nominate your best teacher.

Every student must have to fill out the feedback.

Regarding this, all students are informed to come to class no. 132 on
16/12/2024 at 9.10 am sharp.

Your feedback makes a difference not only for our faculty but also for the
academic journey of future students.

Regards,
-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Poster making Competition for Students & Staff of CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National Energy Conservation Day: 14th
content:
Dear Students,
Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making
competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National
Energy Conservation Day: 14th December 2024."

The theme of the poster is "Innovations in Energy Saving."  The participant
has to submit an *A3 size hand-drawn pencil sketch poster *to the Head,
Electrical Engineering Department, CSPIT (Room No. 136, A6 Building,
CAPIT) before 6 January 2025, 04.30 pm.

First three winners will be awarded prize money.
No Entry Fee.
E-certificate will be provided to all participants.
For more details, contact: Head, Electrical Engineering Dept., CSPIT.

Regards,
[image: Innovations in Energy Saving.jpg]

--

CHARUSAT,

subject: Practical Viva/ Exam of CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics Regarding
snippet: Dear all, The Practical Viva/Exam for CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics for the CL/ME, Mechanical, and Electrical Divisions is scheduled as follows: Date Time Subject 18-12-2024 Wednesday 9.00AM to 04.30
content:
Dear all,

The Practical Viva/Exam for CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics for the CL/ME,
Mechanical, and Electrical Divisions is scheduled as follows:

*Date*

*Time*

*Subject*

18-12-2024

Wednesday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Civil+ Mechanical)(A,B and C Batch)

19-12-2024

Thursday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Mechanical) (A,B and C Batch)

20-12-2024

Friday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Electrical) (A,B and C Batch)


*Please report at 9:00 AM in room 528B for the viva, which will begin
promptly at 9:00 AM. Reporting Time : Batch A reports at 9:00 AM, Batch B
at 10:30 AM, and Batch C at 11:45 AM.*

Note: You will not be allowed to take the practical exam if your lab manual
and tutorial files are not certified by your lab teacher. It is mandatory
to bring your lab manual, tutorial file, hall ticket, and ID card. Failure
to present any of these will result in an AB mark in the Practical
Exam/Viva.

Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*
*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Changa-388421,*
*Dist: Anand,*
*Gujarat*
*Ext No: 5090*

--

snippet: Dear ATHARVA JAYANT CHIMOTE, We would like to bring to your attention an important notification from the Government of India regarding the upload of all student academic records in Digilocker. It has
content:
Dear ATHARVA JAYANT CHIMOTE,

We would like to bring to your attention an important notification from the  
Government of India regarding the upload of all student academic records in  
Digilocker.

It has come to our notice that the details listed below are not updated in  
our records:

To rectify this, you are requested to fill out the Google Form linked below  
to generate your ABC ID:
https://forms.gle/DhbFsrgRyG64vpEj7



Please ensure you provide the following information as per your Aadhar card:
1. Name as per Aadhar Card
2. Aadhar Card Number
3. Mobile Number Linked with Aadhar Card

It is imperative that the above information is filled in, and a copy of  
your Aadhar card is submitted to the Student Section of CHARUSAT within two  
days.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,

--

subject: University practical examination- HSUA101: Communicative English
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that your university practical examination of EE SEM 1 CSPIT for the subject HSUA101: Communicative English is scheduled for Saturday, December 21, 2024. Please
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that your *university practical examination of EE** SEM
1 CSPIT for the subject HSUA101: Communicative English* is scheduled for
 Saturday*, December **21, 2024. *Please review the components and
instructions for the examination below:
Examination Components:

   1. *Quiz*: 40 Marks (to be conducted in class)
   2. *Viva Voce*: 30 Marks
   3. *Speaking*: 30 Marks

*Speaking topics will be shared with you a day before the exam.*
Important Instructions:

   - Formal attire is mandatory.
   - Please bring your *university ID* card and *Hall Ticket,* as they are
   required for the Viva Voce.
   - For exam preparation, refer to all the study material, the topic-wise
   sample question bank, and the practice exercises already shared on WhatsApp.
   - The venue for the examination (quiz) is *room no. 303, 304 and 305*

We wish you the best in your preparation. Please make sure you follow all
instructions.
Thank you

*Bharati H. Kaknani*
Assistant Professor
Department of Humanities and Social Sciences (HSS)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Ext. No. 5135
Contact No. 9925059695
