subject: Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50
snippet: Dear all, All the best for exams...... Please find attached herewith the Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50 for your reference. Continuous evaluation components
content:
Dear all,

All the best for exams......


Please find attached herewith the Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous
Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50 for your reference.

Continuous evaluation components as discussed in the class is: Mid term (20
marks) + Working model / online course (10 marks) + Presentation marks
those who present their model in exhibition(out of 5) + NB / class
participation marks (out of 5) + quizzes marks (out of 10)



Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*
*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Changa-388421,*
*Dist: Anand,*
*Gujarat*
*Ext No: 5090*

Please follow the attached *Seating Arrangement for the University Theory
Examination of MEUC101 Engineering Graphics* on *13th Dec. 2024*. Kindly

the requirement of drawing tables/drawing boards during the engineering
graphics examination.

exam as previously shared.

Please feel free to contact me or Dhaval Bhoi sir for further questions.

Thank you.

subject: Seating Arrangement - CSPIT - BTECH 1st Sem University Exam 24-25 Odd
snippet: Dear Students, Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches,
content:
Dear Students,

Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the
examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students have to take
their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minutes prior to the exam time.

The exam will take place in the IIIM Building (MBA Building), Near Admin
Building, CHARUSAT Campus.

Thank you.

-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.

subject: IIT-MNC CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY students!
snippet: Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY (DEPT's 1st Year), We are in collaboration with IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE & WIPRO DICE ID, and are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program with
content:
Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY
(DEPT's 1st Year),

We are in collaboration with *IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE* & *WIPRO DICE ID*,
and are organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program with
certifications from *CISCO, META|FACEBOOK, IBM* & various other MNCs in
technical and nontechnical domains. We are enrolling only *SHORTLISTED
STUDENTS* in the program for *CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY*.

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received the
notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*


*
                               Registration closing in :*
* 01d 7h 30m 29s*

<https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>Submit Your Application
<https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>Program Details:

*First Month:* Expert training designed with live lectures and mentorship
from industry professionals(10 yr experience). (Login credentials will be
provided to students after registration)

*Second Month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

   - *Project 1:* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern, to be
   completed with their mentor.
   - *Project 2:* Capstone Project: A group project assigned to a group of
   15 interns, with particular work assigned to each intern. (Essential data
   and materials required for the project will be provided by the company.)

Class Formats:

*Blended Program:* Access to recorded classes and live doubt clearing
sessions every weekend.

*Mentor-led/Live Classes:* Live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM for 2 to 3 days a
week, with recorded sessions available.

*LMS Portal:* Access for 6 months.
Certification:

After completion of the program, students will receive:

   - Program completion certificate issued by IIT ROORKEE (COGNIZANCE).
   - Co-branded internship certificate from top MNCs.
   - 100% placement assistance.
   - Access to a thriving professional community.
   - WIPRO DICE Certification.

Submit Your Application <https://forms.gle/UoK4iL7ehBM4VgPS7>

*Congratulations to students who have already been selected for our
programs:*

subject: D2D students : Year 2024-25 MYSY Fresh registration is open
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 at CSPIT EE/EC Building â€“ CSPIT ADMIN OFFICE Room No
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission /
verification start for
D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 *at CSPIT EE/EC Building â€“ CSPIT
ADMIN OFFICE Room No 101.*

*Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form).*

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Student must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form.*

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank).*

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*H. No need of Photograph with the Application.*


*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at said office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at said office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*

-- 
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade â€œA+â€ by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

subject: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
snippet: Dear Students, We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your evaluation process: Quiz 1: Foundation
content:
Dear Students,

We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming
Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your
evaluation process:

Quiz 1: Foundation Course (External Exam Quiz)
Date: 07/12/2024
Time: 3:00 to 3:30 PM
Format: Online (25 Marks)


Quiz 2: Engineering Physics - 1 (2nd Internal Quiz)
Date:   07/12/2024
Time:   3:30 to 4:00 PM
Format: Online (20 Marks)

Both quizzes are mandatory and the Google form link will be shared closer
to the date.


Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*Email: sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>*
*            sunkapatel@gmail.com <sunkapatel@gmail.com>*
*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

--

subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt Compliance â€“ NSS Initiative
snippet: Dear Charusat Family Members, Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit We would like to inform you that it is now mandatory for all Students,Staff and faculty Members to: Wear helmets while riding two-wheelers
content:
Dear  Charusat Family Members,

Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit

We would like to inform you that it is now *mandatory* for all
Students,Staff and faculty Members to:

   - *Wear helmets* while riding two-wheelers.
   - *Fasten seat belts* when driving or traveling in a car.

To ensure adherence, *NSS Volunteers* *will be stationed at both university
gates to monitor compliance and raise awareness.* We kindly ask everyone to
be *polite and cooperative* with them, as they are working to safeguard
your safety.

This initiative is *compulsory* and has been implemented to maintain a safe
environment for all members of the CHARUSAT community.

Your cooperation is crucial to the success of this initiative. Letâ€™s work
together to make our campus safer.

Thank you for your Valuable support and understanding .


--
Regards,
Kishan Patel
NSS Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS UNIT

--

subject: Submission Deadline for Journal and Lab Manual â€“ Engineering Physics-I
snippet: Dear Students, This is a reminder regarding submitting your Journal and Lab Manual for the subject Engineering Physics-I. Please note the following details: Submission Deadline: on/before 30th November
content:
Dear Students,

This is a reminder regarding submitting your *Journal* and *Lab Manual* for
the subject *Engineering Physics-I*. Please note the following details:

   - *Submission Deadline:* on/before 30th November 2024
   - *Where to Submit:* Respective lab-in-charge
   - *Requirements:* Ensure all experiments are completed, signed, and
   properly documented in the journal and lab manual. Moreover, Journals must
   be certified. *(Signed on certificate/first page)*

Timely submission is mandatory, No submissions will be accepted after the
above-mentioned deadline.

Best regards,
Sanni

--

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Letâ€™s showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, letâ€™s make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: University Theory Exam Schedule: 1st semester
snippet: Dear Students, The first semester university theory exam schedule is attached herewith. All the pending fee students are informed to pay on or before 30 November 2024; otherwise, hall tickets will not
content:
Dear Students,
The first semester university theory exam schedule is attached herewith.

All the pending fee students are informed to pay on or before 30 November
2024; otherwise, hall tickets will not be issued. Hall tickets will only be
issued on clearance of the cheque.

You will be solely responsible for missing any theory/Practical exam due to
non payment of fees.

Practical exams will be conducted between 16/12/2024 to 23/12/2024,
including both days.


Regards,

subject: Reminder MSUD101 Quiz II(22/11/2024 at 11:15)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Eulerâ€™s theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurinâ€™s and Taylorâ€™s series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
During the quiz, if you face any problem, then consult me in room no 309,
2nd floor, Ec Ee building CSPIT.
Re-quiz will not be taken in case you remain absent.


*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Students of Charotar University of Science and Technology FINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND JANUARY BATCH Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a 2-month Training +
content:
Dear Students of

*Charotar University of Science and TechnologyFINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND
JANUARY BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance *IIT Roorkee*, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the* Induction Session*
 valuable.

*Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [19-11-2024]*

*  Application Form  *


*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*
*REFERRAL ID: DICE CSAT *(For CHARUSAT College Students only)



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

first midterm exam),

Please find the *Seating Arrangement (Day Wise) for the Midterm
Examination, Nov. 2024* in the attachment.

*1. Seating Arrangement for Day-1: 18/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*
*2. Seating Arrangement for Day-2: 19/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*
*3. Seating Arrangement for Day-3: 20/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*

The teaching will be continued during these three days (18/11/2024 to
20/11/2024). Please take note of it.

Feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions. (Room No. 425, A7

subject: Mid sem Exam Syllabus For late admitted students ( Students who have not given previousÂ mid sem) for the subjectÂ CLUC102-Â EMÂ
snippet: Dear all, The mid sem exam Syllabus for the subject CLUC102- EM is as follows: Unit 2.2 Moments and Couples Unit 2.3 Coplanar Non-Concurrent Force system Unit 2.4 Equilibrium of Rigid bodies Unit 3
content:
Dear all,

*The mid sem exam Syllabus for the subject CLUC102- EM is as follows: *

*Unit 2.2*

*Moments and Couples*

*Unit 2.3*

*Coplanar Non-Concurrent Force system*

*Unit  2.4*

*Equilibrium of Rigid bodies*

*Unit 3*

*Friction*

*Unit 4*

*Truss*


*Note:According to the Dean sir's message, students must score at least 18
out of 50 to pass the exam (both internal and external). Mid Sem
examination is mandatory for all and mid sem marks will be added directly
in internal 50 marks components.*

Thanks and Regards,

subject: Re: Midterm exam syllabus for MEUC101 Engineering Graphics
snippet: Same syllabus for next midterm exam 1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing 1.1 Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials, BIS and ISO 1.2 Different types of lines used in
content:
Same syllabus for next midterm exam

1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing
1.1 Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials,
BIS and ISO
1.2 Different types of lines used in engineering practice, methods of
projections as per SP 46-1988.
1.3 Engineering scale.
Lab 4 topics: title block, types of lines, geometric const. & dimensioning
system
2.Projections of Points and Lines
3.Projections of Planes
5.Orthographic Projection

subject: Regarding Update Aadhar Details in e-Governance Profile
snippet: Dear ATHARVA JAYANT CHIMOTE, This message is being sent to you by CHARUSAT University because your information is not validated by the Daglocker portal of the Government of India. Please check and
content:
DEAR ATHARVA JAYANT CHIMOTE,

This message is being sent to you by CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY BECAUSE YOUR
INFORMATION IS NOT VALIDATED BY THE DAGLOCKER PORTAL of the Government
of India. 

PLEASE CHECK AND UPDATE THE FOLLOWING FIELDS IN YOUR PROFILE:

 	* AADHAAR NUMBER: Check and update your proper Aadhaar number
 	* STUDENT NAME AS PER AADHAAR: The name must match exactly as per
your Aadhaar card.
 	* STUDENT MOBILE NUMBER AS PER AADHAAR: This should be the mobile
number you registered when creating your Aadhaar.

IN CASE OF ANY ISSUES, PLEASE CONTACT THE STUDENT SECTION AT CHARUSAT
UNIVERSITY DURING COLLEGE WORKING HOURS.

PLEASE UPDATE YOUR DETAILS WITHIN 2 DAYS.

YOU CAN UPDATE YOUR DETAILS BY VISITING THE E-GOVERNANCE PORTAL: 

FOR UPDATING E-GOVERNANCE PROFILE
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/qz417qhnz7dbd/track-url/as872s4a7j981/ee0b1b1eee5db8cbe8a07faaaf458e9ac3ac46e5]

CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY

subject: Fwd: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the â€˜Ask Our Expertâ€™ Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00 pm Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00â€¯pm
Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
â€˜Ask Our Expertâ€™ Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding


Dear Madam/Sir,
Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) ..!

We are pleased to inform you that the Ministry of Electronics and
Information Technology (MeitY) is organizing a *online live talk show *on
the *Academic Bank of Credits(ABC)*, a project of the Ministry of Education
(MoE) aimed at providing a seamless, student-centric learning experience
while enhancing the ease of credit accumulation and transfer for students
across institutions.

As part of the outreach efforts under the Digital India Initiative, MeitY
is hosting the 3rd episode of the â€œAsk Our Expert Programmeâ€ focused on
ABC-NAD. This programme will be held *on November 8, 2024, starting at 1 PM
onwards*. *The live talk show will be conducted by experts from the
government, featuring focused discussions aimed at equipping faculty,
students, and administrators from various Academic Institutions (AIs) with
essential knowledge about the benefits, implementation process, and
opportunities associated with the ABC*.Given the role that these
stakeholders play in the success of the Academic Bank of Credits, we
earnestly urge you to encourage and facilitate their participation in this
session.

The details for joining the webinar are mentioned below:-

Â·         *Date*: 8th November 2024
Â·       *  Time*: 1 PM onwards
Â·         *Platform*: YouTube Official Digital India Channel
Â·         *Link*: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dqIoGwIXjoM

This session will not only deepen the understanding of participants about
ABC but also align them with the Digital India vision for a more connected
and efficient educational ecosystem. The insights shared during this will
empower faculty to effectively leverage ABC, support students in their
academic journeys and help administrators optimize institutional credit
management practices.

We trust that this collaboration will greatly benefit our educational
community, ultimately contributing to a more integrated and accessible
learning environment for all.

For any further assistance, Mr. Gaurav Khare may kindly be contacted at
gaurav.khare1@digitalindia.gov.in.

Thank you for your support in encouraging faculty and students to engage in
the future of e-governance and collaborative technology platforms.

In view of the foregoing,  AICTE requests your institution to share this
information with all the faculty, students, staff, and others, so that they
can benefit from it.

--

snippet: Dear Students Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024 for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in the Midterm exam conducted in the
content:
Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: Fwd: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.
snippet: Dear Girls Students, Greetings for the Day!! Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov
content:
Dear Girls Students,

Greetings for the Day!!

Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing
mail.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, 31 Oct, 2024, 11:19â€¯am
Subject: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon
(AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.



Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2024/30-Oct/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Respected Madam/Sir,

*Greetings from AICTE!*

AICTE in collaboration with Shooting Stars Foundation has launched the *All
India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up
competition exclusively for women!* This is a great opportunity for
entrepreneurially ambitious women to turn their ideas into impactful
ventures. You are encouraged to circulate the details amongst women
students of the below program and urge them to participate in maximum
numbers.

*Key Details:*

   - Registrations: Now Open
   - Eligibility: Women across India (can participate individually or as
   part of a team)
   - Mode: Fully Online
   - There is no registration fee and students will not be required to pay
   any fee at any stage of the program
   - Registration link:
   https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Ao5Ubh0xGUJFqcvscdjpLdU01nKEUAA7pCUuBKxIH4U
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=769680ef3c574a5d93da237d42fc6e175d7e3844&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
   - For Questions: aiwos@sstarsfoundation.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=4359d6e7d64444273436de745bffd060e834cc53&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>

*About AIWOS:*

AIWOS is a national level start-up competition exclusively for Women to
spark entrepreneurship interest in women students. We are bringing together
experts and organizations for a 1st of its kind *Women Exclusive Startup
Program* to maximize their learning and career outcomes.

*Women students registering/participating for AIWOS ? *

   - Tailored training programs to enhance employability (Registered
   Students will get details of upcoming webinars)


   - Mentorship from industry leaders and successful entrepreneurs
   - Chance for start-ups to be considered by top angel investors and
   incubators for funding and incubation support
   - Internship/Placement opportunities at top corporates

Kindly motivate women students to take advantage of this opportunity to
accelerate their careers and step towards their entrepreneurial journey!

 PFA:-
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sWNE6HblCwe1vf3T3QZvXVtFtOmzBdnQ/view?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=2989eedcbd6de7b1c233fab1ecb73708951fc41c&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>



*With Warm Regards,**Amit Dutta**,*
*(PhD.)*
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>*
*New Delhi- 110070
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>
*
*Phone no. 011-29581117**Email id - *directorpnap@aicte-india.org
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=778b61d2a69a9b992e90629cb3460fb650818909&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
Share it on Social Media [image: social icon]
<https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fjan-sampark.nic.in%2Fcampaigns%2F2024%2F30-Oct%2FAICTE%2Findex.html>
[image:

subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. Earlier it was scheduled for 18/11/202. It has been
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Eulerâ€™s theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurinâ€™s and Taylorâ€™s series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY ANAND, GUJRAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-
content:
*DEAR STUDENTSOFCHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYANAND, GUJRAT*

*Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>


* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Donâ€™t miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear First Year Student of Charusat University Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the Induction Session
content:
Dear First Year Student of
*Charusat University*

*Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the Induction Session
valuable.  We are pleased to inform you that, in response to the
overwhelming interest from students, the registration deadline has been
extended until 8:00 PM today. For those who have yet to submit the
application form, please complete it now.*

*Application Deadline: 04:00 PM [29-10-2024]*
*[LAST 10 SLOTS AVAILABLE]*

*  Application Form  *
*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*

*REFERRAL ID: DICE ID (For **Charusat* *Students only)*



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: Internship Invitation for Charusat 1st year students
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an AICTE-approved internship program in collaboration with TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee. Fill out the application below: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce an *AICTE-approved internship program* in
collaboration with *TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee*.

Fill out the application below:
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link*
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link>

*About the Program:*

This program provides a *2-month Training + Internship* program, and we
accept a particular* number of students*.

*Program Overview:*

   - *First Month:* Live lectures delivered by *industry professionals*.
   You will receive login credentials after registration.
   - *Second Month:* Internship with live project mentorship. Gain
   experience solving *real-world problems*.

*Projects:*

   - *Individual Projects:* Each intern will be assigned *10 projects* to
   complete with mentor guidance.
   - *Capstone Project:* A collaborative group project where each intern is
   responsible for specific tasks.

necessary *resources* and *materials* will be provided.

*Learning Options:*

   1. *Blended Program (Recorded Classes):* entrance to recorded sessions
   with weekend *live doubt-clearing sessions*.
   2. *Mentor-Led Program (Live Classes):* *Live classes* via Zoom, *2-3
   days a week* at *6:30 PM*, with visibility to recordings and a *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for 6 months.

*Upon Completion, You Will Receive:*

   - *Certificate of completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - *Co-branded internship certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *Placement support*.
   - Entry to our *growing professional community*.
   - Hands-on experience with *low-code and no-code tools*.
   - Expertise in *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - *Exclusive Masterclasses* from industry leaders.
   - *Personalized guidance* throughout the program.

snippet: Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the first midterm exam), Please find the First Semester Midterm Examination Schedule, Nov. 2024 in the attachment. This exam
content:
Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the
first midterm exam),

Please find the *First Semester Midterm Examination Schedule, Nov. 2024*
in the attachment. This exam will be conducted for *late admitted students
and absent students* (in the first midterm exam), as per the attached
student list using *traditional paper examination* (using supplementary: on
paper, No Tablet). Kindly find the attachment.

Feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions. (Room No. 425, A7
Building & +91-9726622007)

I will share the seating arrangements after the Diwali Break.

Thank you.

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN â€“ 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN â€“ 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - Worldâ€™s No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024) - For CHARUSAT Students Only
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome â€œCHARUSATâ€ *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *100+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*Whatâ€™s new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*â€¢ ShellGPT* â€“ Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*â€¢ ChatGPT *â€“ Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
â€¢ *FraudGPT* â€“ Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
â€¢ *WormGPT* â€“ An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
â€¢ *DeepExploit* â€“ AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
â€¢ *Nebula* â€“ Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
â€¢ *Veed.io* â€“ Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

*Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of
CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA


*Testimonials:*

   - How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant
   Gupta <https://youtu.be/PLvVyh96n8M?si=IVLEptb5F-QPMUaw>
   - Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi
   <https://youtu.be/TO7veOnV9T4?si=uzHTokSpVAtp1iOm>
   - How C|EH Helped Me Build a Successful Career in Cybersecurity
   <https://youtu.be/SZ8tmKzyBh4?si=TZpSsdfrCeZf2I2j>


*Cost for CHARUSAT Students only:*

Only the length of the pendulum


Both the mass and the length of the pendulum


Only the amplitude of the swing

They are suitable for structural applications requiring high strength.


They can easily undergo large deformations.

They are extremely brittle.

dyne/ cm^2

subject: CHARUSAT Team Selection for All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

snippet: Dear students, Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA and allied courses. The resource person is Dr
content:
Dear students,

Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and
techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA
and allied courses.

The resource person is Dr. Darshan Pandya from one of the leading
institutes, School of Business Management, NMIMS University, Mumbai. He is
also an alumni of CHARUSAT. So it's a great chance to interact with him for
getting proper and crystal clear information from him to clear competitive
examinations for getting admission in top Business schools of India.

Fill the form to register for the webinar via
https://forms.gle/1axWRhSVZUDEbgfE6 link.
*LIMITED SEATS ARE THERE . FIRST COME FIRST SERVE.*

Event details are given below.

*Webinar on "MBA from Indian B-schools"*
*Date: 22nd **October, 2024  *
*Time: 5:00 pm onwards *

*Platform :  Google Meet*
[image: Slide1.JPG]


*Thanks and regards.*





*Harmish BhattAssistant Professor,Department of Mechanical
Engineering,Faculty of Technology & EngineeringCharotar University of
Science & Technology*
*Education Campus Changa -388421 *
*Dist: Anand, Gujarat India*




*Phone Contact:Mobile: 094286 57212(O): 02697 265324Fax: 02697 247100*

subject: Working model exhibition group no with the list of students in each group
snippet: Dear all, Attached is the group number for the working model exhibition. Please be seated by 1:45 PM. Your group number is written in small handwriting on the bench in the corner, and you can take your
content:
Dear all,

Attached is the group number for the working model exhibition. Please be
seated by 1:45 PM. Your group number is written in small handwriting on the
bench in the corner, and you can take your seat accordingly. Please bring a
hard copy of your project report and keep it handy during the exhibition.

Also prepare an A4 sized paper indicating your group number and project
name and display it on the table (Do not stick the paper on wall or bench)
for easy reference by visitors and judges.


One

Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*
*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Changa-388421,*
*Dist: Anand,*
*Gujarat*
*Ext No: 5090*

mahammadsoaibsaiyad.ee@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear All
>
> As you are aware, Anti- Ragging Cell is established in our University to
> keep our University free from any ragging activity. With reference to UGC
> guidelines it is compulsory for each student and parents to submit an
> online anti-ragging affidavit *every academic year.*
>
> The step by step procedure for the anti ragging affidavit is given below.
>
> Step 1:  CLICK HERE <https://antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php>
>  for filing affidavits of anti-ragging.
>
> Step 2: Fill in the information as mentioned in the help file attached and
> submit the form.
>
> Additional information which will be asked while filling the
> online affidavit.
>
> Principal Name: Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
>
> College phone no: 2697265011
>
> Nearest Police station: Mehlav Police Station , Mehlav - 388440 ,Ta-
> Petlad , Dist- Anand, Gujarat , India
>
> Step 3: On successful completion you will receive a  REFERENCE ID/NUMBER
> .
>
> Step 4: Download the anti ragging affidavits by CLICKING HERE
> <https://antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php>. Enter the REFERENCE ID
> and other details as mentioned in the help file page no 7.
>
>
> Step 5 : Rename the affidavits as  per your ID number followed by
> student/parent (DIFFERENT pdf FILE FOR STUDENT AND PARENT) . *e.g.
> 23EE0001_STUDENT.pdf, 23EE001_PARENT.PDF*
>
> Step 6 : Submit all the details by CLICKING HERE
> <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2fu9AFYicpN1Y39ZfQHKYoubyp_CcDyljQ0sHQ1FL1t0ZMQ/viewform>
> . *Complete this on or before 10.00 am of 18.10.2024.*
>
> I will ask later on for the submission of hard / softcopies of the
> affidavits.
>

> * Regards*

subject: Parents-Teacher Meeting: 19 October 2024
snippet: Dear Students, Hope you are doing well. A Parents-Teacher meeting of our department has been scheduled on 19th October 2024 at 10.30 am to 12.00 noon. You are requested to inform your parents to remain
content:
Dear Students,
Hope you are doing well.
A Parents-Teacher meeting of our department has been scheduled on 19th
October 2024 at 10.30 am to 12.00 noon.
You are requested to inform your parents to remain present as per the given
schedule without fail.
The agenda for the meeting is as under.
1. Achievement of Electrical Engineering department last year.
2. Result discussion of 1st internal exam.
3. Information about upcoming exams.
4. Information about student clubs and activities.

Hoping to see you all with your parents.

Regards,

-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, About Foundation Course: Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a mandatory audit course for all 1st semester BTech students. This course is designed to bridge the gap between
content:
Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

subject: ANTI RAGGING AFFIDAVITS 2024-2025
snippet: Dear All As you are aware, Anti- Ragging Cell is established in our University to keep our University free from any ragging activity. With reference to UGC guidelines it is compulsory for each student
content:
Dear All

As you are aware, Anti- Ragging Cell is established in our University to
keep our University free from any ragging activity. With reference to UGC
guidelines it is compulsory for each student and parents to submit an
online anti-ragging affidavit *every academic year.*

The step by step procedure for the anti ragging affidavit is given below.

Step 1:  CLICK HERE <https://antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php>
 for filing affidavits of anti-ragging.

Step 2: Fill in the information as mentioned in the help file attached and
submit the form.

Additional information which will be asked while filling the
online affidavit.

Principal Name: Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya

College phone no: 2697265011

Nearest Police station: Mehlav Police Station , Mehlav - 388440 ,Ta- Petlad
, Dist- Anand, Gujarat , India

Step 3: On successful completion you will receive a  REFERENCE ID/NUMBER  .

Step 4: Download the anti ragging affidavits by CLICKING HERE
<https://antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php>. Enter the REFERENCE ID
and other details as mentioned in the help file page no 7.


Step 5 : Rename the affidavits as  per your ID number followed by
student/parent (DIFFERENT pdf FILE FOR STUDENT AND PARENT) . *e.g.
23EE0001_STUDENT.pdf, 23EE001_PARENT.PDF*

Step 6 : Submit all the details by CLICKING HERE
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2fu9AFYicpN1Y39ZfQHKYoubyp_CcDyljQ0sHQ1FL1t0ZMQ/viewform>
. *Complete this on or before 10.00 am of 18.10.2024.*

I will ask later on for the submission of hard / softcopies of the
affidavits.






* Regards*

*MAHAMMADSOAIB SAIYAD*
ASSISTANT PROFESSOR
M & V PATEL DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING
C S P I T
CHARUSAT
CHANGA
M : 8485916188, 9898204501
Phone : 02697 265054
*Room No. 109 , EE Building , CSPIT,CHARUSAT*

--

content:
Hey everyone,

Just a gentle reminder to become an *IEEE Member* before 12th October that
is *TODAY* to avail maximum discounts. For your ease we have mentioned the
important student promo codes and also attached a document with step by
step method to take the membership : -

1. IEEE Computer Science Society - CSIEEEDAYSTU24
2. IEEE Signal Processing Society - IEEEDAY2024SPS
3. IEEE Communication Society - IEEEDAYCOMSOC-S
4. IEEE Smart Cities - SMARTCITIES100

Also you can visit for more Special Offers on IEEE Day Link:
https://ieeeday.org/special-activities-offers/

Join *IEEE *using link: https://www.ieee.org/membership/join/index.html

A quick reminder to *use *your *personal email ID* when applying for
membership. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your
knowledge, expand your professional network, and grow with IEEE. Join us
today and make the most of IEEE Day 2024!

subject: IEEE Membership Special Offers.
snippet: Hello budding engineers, We hope you are doing well. Did you know IEEE is celebrating IEEE Day 2024 in the month of October. They have offered special membership offers. They are active till 12 October
content:
Hello budding engineers,

We hope you are doing well. Did you know *IEEE* is celebrating *IEEE Day *
*2024* in the month of October. They have offered special membership
offers. They are active till *12 October 2024. *

*What is IEEE?*

IEEE is the worldâ€™s largest technical professional organization. Our
Student Branches offer opportunities for career development, technical
learning, leadership experience, and networking in engineering and related
fields.

*Why Join the IEEE?*

   - *Build Your Resume:* Participate in projects, workshops, and
   hackathons in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software Development to gain
   real-world experience.
   - *Networking Opportunities:* Connect with industry professionals,
   mentors, and peers for internships, jobs, and career advice.
   - *Leadership Experience:* Take on roles to develop management,
   team-building, and communication skills.
   - *Global Competitions & Events:* Compete in IEEE Xtreme and attend IEEE
   conferences to showcase your abilities.
   - *Exclusive Resources:* Access the IEEE Xplore digital library to stay
   ahead in coursework and research.


There are promo codes available for some *IEEE* societies also.* Kindly note
you must be an IEEE member first before taking any IEEE society membership.*


*1. IEEE Computer Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members: CSIEEEDAY24*


*2. IEEE Signal Processing Society: 50% discount for new members
only: IEEEDAY2024SPS*

3. IEEE Power and Energy Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY24PES

4. IEEE Smart cities technical community will be free using code:
SMARTCITIES100

5.  IEEE Education Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:EDIEEEDAYHG25

6. IEEE Electronics Packaging Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024EPS

7. IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Society: 50% discount for new members
only: IEEEDAY2024GRS

8. IEEE magnetics Society will be *free* using code:IEEEDAY2024MAG

9.  IEEE Broadcast Technology Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024BTS

10. IEEE Reliability Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY2024RLS

11. IEEE Communications society: 50% discount for new members only:

content:
Dear all,

Access to view answer scripts for the recent midterm examinations

subject: Invitation : Working Model Exhibition on 18/10/2024 by 1st year CL/ME/EE students from 2:00 to 4:00
snippet: Dear all, MS Patel Department of Civil Engineering at CSPIT, CHARUSAT, invites you to an exhibition of working models based on the principles of Engineering Mechanics (CLUC102) for first-year students
content:
Dear all,

M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering at CSPIT, CHARUSAT, invites you
to an exhibition of working models based on the principles of Engineering
Mechanics (CLUC102) for first-year students in Civil, Mechanical, and
Electrical Engineering.



The event will improve first-year civil, mechanical, and electrical
engineering students' teamwork, confidence, and presentation skills.
Approximately 46 models will be created by these students, with each group
displaying their model and explaining its function and underlying
principles to visitors.



The  event details are as follows:

Â·       *Date:* 18th October 2024 ; *Time:* 2:00 pm to 04:00 pm

Â·       *Venue:* Central Square and Lobby from GT lab to CT lab, A7
Building, Ground floor



The flow of the exhibition will be as follows:

Â·       Students will showcase their working model to visitors from 2:00 PM
to 4:00 PM.



*I kindly ask that you take a moment out of your undoubtedly busy schedules
to offer your encouragement and support to the students as they embark on
their very first attempt. Your words of motivation will mean a great deal
to them and can greatly influence their confidence in this important
endeavor.*

Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*
*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Changa-388421,*
*Dist: Anand,*
*Gujarat*
*Ext No: 5090*

--

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear First Year Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship Program! NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH Teachnook, in
content:
Dear First Year Student of *Charotar University of Science and Technology *


*Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship
Program!*
*NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

*FINAL CALL FOR NOVEMBER BATCH*

*  Application Form:  *
*https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8 <https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8>*
*(LAST 10 SLOTS ARE AVAILABLE)*


*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.



*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*

Warm regards,

Teachnook
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: MYSY Scholarship Criteria
snippet: Dear Students!! Greetings!! Hope you are doing well. As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (MYSY) scholarship. If the candidate does not
content:
Dear Students!!
Greetings!!
Hope you are doing well.
As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the
Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (*MYSY) *scholarship. If the candidate
does not meet the criteria, the institute may not be able to process the
scholarship. The candidate shall be asked to justify such instance and the
institute shall have sole discretion for consideration of justification.

The remaining 25% may be spared for leaves viz. medical issues, family
events, festivals etc. However, it is strongly recommended that more than
80% of attendance be maintained in both classrooms and laboratories.

All the best,
Trushit Upadhyaya

-- 
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand
Gujarat, India.

--

snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Kindly note that the link to the quiz -1 is as follows. You must have your CHARUSAT Mail ID to appear in quiz-1. If you have any queries, consult me in the staff room 309 Ec-
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the link to the quiz -1 is as follows. You must have your
CHARUSAT Mail ID to appear in quiz-1.
 If you have any queries, consult me in the staff room 309 Ec-Ee building,
CSPIT.
If you cannot access the quiz through your phone, sign out all Gmail
accounts from your device and then sign in CHARUSAT mail ID. After this,
you can appear in the quiz.
*If you do not have your institute mail id or password of it, then consult
me in the staff room at 11:10 AM. I will make other arrangements for such
students.*


Link :https://forms.gle/GocLPPKU4PED3gnr6
Time: 11:15 AM to 11:25 AM
*The link will be enabled at 11:14 AM.*

*I will close the link at 11:26 AM. You have to select your answer and
submit the form on or before 11:26 AM. *

*BEST OF LUCK *
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *

*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*

Dear Students,

We are thrilled to invite you to *"The Idea Show 3.0" (In It To Win It)*,
an exciting event jointly organized by *Aavishkar Club, CMPICA, and CSIC,
CHARUSAT*. This is your chance to unleash your creativity, showcase
innovative ideas, and compete with like-minded peers in the fields of

Artificial Intelligence, and Healthcare*!

   - *Theme*: Automation / Artificial Intelligence / Healthcare
   - *Team Size*: upto 4 Members
   - *Organizers*: Aavishkar Club, CMPICA, and CSIC, CHARUSAT
   - *Registration Link*: Click Here <https://tinyurl.com/Ideashow3>

We have also attached the *QR code* for quick access to the registration
link in the brochure.

All *participants will receive certificates*, and *winners will be awarded
exciting prizes* for their outstanding ideas.

Donâ€™t miss this golden opportunity to present your ideas, innovate, and
win! We look forward to your participation in making this event a success.

For any further queries, please feel free to contact the organizing team.
Find the brochure attached herewith. Furthermore, the details like venue
and timings will be shared by the email after registrations.


*Best Regards,*












*Aavishkar Club Members,Dr. Shailesh Khant,Dr. Arpankumar Raval,Dr. Kamini
Solanki,Dr. Sagar KavaiyaDr. Amisha SinghalaCSIC, Charusat,Dr. Jaimin

*CHARUSAT*

snippet: CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT) DEAR STUDENT 24ee001 DEPARTMENT OF EE AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM - MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING WITH COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE [HAS BEEN
content:
CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT)



*DEAR STUDENT  24ee001DEPARTMENT OF EE*

*AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM  - MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING WITH
COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE [HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN G FORM]*

We are offering a *2-month Course Training & Internship* in collaboration
with *COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE* and *WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATES* by
Teachscape.
How to Participate:

   1. *Fill Out the Form : * *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
   <https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

   (First 50 applicants may qualify for scholarship seatsâ€”first come, first
   served.)

Collaborating Companies:

   - MICROSOFT
   - IBM
   - CISCO
   - META
   - WIPRO

*Program Details:*

   - *Duration:* 1 or 2 months (your choice)
   - *Mode:* Remote
   - *Batches:* September, October, November, December

Benefits Upon Completion:

   - *Completion Certificate* from COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE
   - *Co-Branded Internship Certificate* from top MNCs
   - *100% Placement Assistance*
   - *Access to a Growing Community*
   - *Letter of Recommendation*
   - *Placement Training* (Resume building, mock interviews)

Program Structure:

   - *First Month:* Live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals.
   - *Second Month:* Hands-on industry projects with mentor guidance.
   - *Project 1:* Individual projects assigned to each intern.
      - *Project 2:* Group capstone project with a team of 15 interns.

Why Choose This Program?

   - First in India to offer low-code and no-code tools.
   - LinkedIn Top Startup 2023.
   - Certifications verified through Wipro Dice ID.
   - Learn from industry leaders and mentors.
   - Cutting-edge curriculum on generative AI and prompt engineering.

*Click here to apply:*  *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
<https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

Secure your spot and enhance your skills with this valuable program!

subject: Quiz - I of MSUD101 on 07/10/2024
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024
between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute mail id (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
otherwise, you will not be able to give the exam.*
*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 1
Lagrangeâ€™s Mean Value Theorem, Local Maxima and Minima of the function of
one variable
Successive differentiation: nth derivative of elementary functions:
rational, logarithmic, trigonometric, exponential and hyperbolic
Leibnitz rule for the nth-order derivatives of the product of two functions
Power series expansion of a function: Maclaurinâ€™s and Taylorâ€™s series
expansion.
Lâ€™Hospitalâ€™s rule and related applications, Indeterminate forms

Unit 3
Definition of Matrix, types of matrices and their properties
Determinant and their properties
Rank and nullity of a matrix
Determination of rank
Solution of a system of linear equations by Gauss elimination and Gauss
Jordan Methods


Unit 4
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation

subject: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted) students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, You might know that the Government of India has initiated National Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020). One of the important points under the policy, applicable to higher education
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

You might know that the Government of India has initiated *National
Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020)*. One of the important points under the
policy, applicable to higher education, is to provide a  *CREDIT transfer
facility* through *ABC-ID*(Academic Bank of Credits-ID).

In line with the above-mentioned subject, you all are requested to *create
the ABC-ID* (IF you havn't created yet) from the below-given website. The
details of the need for ABC-ID and its benefits are mentioned in the
presentation as available in the link below. please go through the
presentation for a detailed understanding of the same.

*Kindly find the attachment regarding different ways to create ABC-ID.*

*Link of ABC-ID Presentation manual*:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vokIiR3YRPeU_4qNAxa3cosi9lHFewm5HBUxfJA-IQw/preview?slide=
id.p
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Regarding ABC ID*
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps to create ABC id is:

step-1: create abc id from: https://www.abc.gov.in/
step-2: Select student as shown below:

[image: image.png]

*The online meeting to solve doubts/queries (If any) regarding the ABC-ID
is scheduled as per below:*

Date:  07/10/2024, Monday
Time: 11.10 am
Meeting Link: Meeting link will be shared soon [Microsoft Team]




-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7

content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Rohit from Bolt IoT <trainings@boltiot.com>
Date: Thu, Sep 26, 2024 at 4:17â€¯PM
Subject: IIT Ropar's live online session on 'Getting a Minor in AI
(Artificial Intelligence) from IIT for Better Placements' for students of
CHARUSAT
To: <mihirbhatt.ee@charusat.ac.in>


Session by IIT Ropar. Enhance chances of securing high-paying jobs and
internships in the field of artificial intelligence

Dear Professor Dr.Mihir Bhatt,

Earlier this month, one of the IITs organised a live online session to
guide students in getting jobs and internships. These programs organised as
part of the NEP 2020 have tremendously helped students in getting jobs and
internships. We appreciate your support, Professor, in spreading the word.
Your assistance in helping students build their careers is commendable.
Thank you!



While the job market has been slow, the field of AI (Artificial
Intelligence) is experiencing a high demand for engineers, developers and
students with knowledge in this area.



Keeping this in mind, I am happy to share that Indian Institute of
Technology (IIT) Ropar is organising a session on this topic of 'Maximise
Job & Internship Oppotunities: How to get a Minor in AI (Artificial
Intelligence) from IIT for Better Placements'.



We request you to *share the invite with your students *by *forwarding this
email *or* click here to share over WhatsApp.
<https://czvL704.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/T8+113/czvL704/VXdCbh7xjVrSVHDSM28xD-XWW8hW1h35lqW0ZN7FnD2g3qn9gW95jsWP6lZ3lcW1C_5-H8vfnWmW5CWTLq2XdrnYVKbRLG5M3m50W49kC2488pYWWW61c9Mf6qtgkCW96B_Fs4KfnkZW3sN0rW3MD_hvW3Tzx-f2zVP9hW40BKyq5Rp1G5W1PlVdJ8ymQ0wW4GF-Ty72J06QW4JNSHq3Jgk40W8Y_Pqx2mlDWzW4q39lT51kYzNMl6wsVJ5ytYN4x7dtLGYDQyW7kv80V5mBzt2VmXBxZ4lVMVvW30H2tl8WcVLrW4wb_X787cbkRN3XVn1YJqj3hW6WGk5g5sr-WMW1J232c8xJxt2W8vYzn6843Vs9W3SFVRq1V93K-W2JM8vb3xv_JpW9jDZZ72jl69dW7lTqW49jYgnvW8B_mJX7bQbYhW8Jj9B_6lD-xnf8kp3Cd04>*

   - This online event will guide students on getting a Minor in AI
   (Artificial Intelligence) from an IIT.
   - *Senior Industry Experts and Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)
   Alumnus will be the speaker.*
   - Technical and non-technical Students from any degree, *1st to final
   year from your college are invited* for this program.

*Live online event details:*

   - *Topic: *Maximise Job & Internship Oppotunities: How to get a Minor in
      AI (Artificial Intelligence) from IIT for Better Placements

snippet: CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT) DEAR STUDENT 24ee001 ** AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM ** We are providing Course Training & Internship for 2 months with COGNIZANCE -
content:
*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT)*

*DEAR STUDENT 24ee001*

** *AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM* **

We are providing Course Training & Internship for 2 months with *COGNIZANCE
- IIT ROORKEE *with *WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATES BY TEACHSCAPE*

*To participate, you must complete the following steps:*

*(First 50 students who apply for the program will be eligible
for scholarship seats on the basis of first come first serve. )*

1. *Fill Out the Form :*   *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
<https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

*Collaborated Companies for course offered: MICROSOFT
,IBM,CISCO,META,WIPRO   *
*Duration:1 & 2 months(Based on your preference)*
*Mode: REMOTE *
*Batches: SEPTEMBER,OCTOBER,NOVEMBER,DECEMBER*

 [CERTIFICATIONS & MENTORS PROFILE INCLUDED] to express your interest and
secure your spot in the program.

*2. Upon Completion of the Program, You Will Receive:*

âœ…  *Program Completion Certificate* from *COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE*.
âœ…  *Co-Branded Internship Certificate* from top  *MNCs.*
âœ…  *100% Placement Assistance.*
âœ…  *Access to a Growing Community.*
*âœ…  Letter Of Recommendationâœ…  Placement Training (Resume
Building Sessions,Mock Interview Sessions)*

3. *Review Additional Details:*

   - *AICTE Portal Approved *
   - *COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE Collaboration *

*Program Structure:*

*First Month: Includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon registration.*
*Second Month:Focuses on live industry projects with mentorship. The
program includes.*

 *Project 1:* Ten individual projects assigned to each intern, to be
completed with mentor guidance.
* Project 2: A Capstone Project, involving group work with a team of 15
interns. Specific roles and materials will be provided.*

*click here to apply: *  *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
<https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

*- Indiaâ€™s First: Offering programs with low-code and no-code tools,
ensuring outcome-driven results.*

Masterclasses with top global companiesâ€™ students, founders, and CXOs.-
