subject: Blood Donation Camp on 30/09/2024
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our community. CHRF and NSS units of
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family,*

We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special
event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our
community. CHRF and NSS units of CHARUSAT, BDIPS, ARIP and MTIN
have organized a Blood donation camp in collaboration with the Lions Club
of Nadiad Mains, and Indian Red Cross Society. We invite each one of you to
participate and contribute to this noble cause.

Blood Donation Camp details are as under:



*Date: 30/09/2024*

*Time: 09:30 am to 3:30 pm*

*Location: Physiotherapy Department, Ground floor, CHRF, CHARUSAT *



Let's come together as a university community and make
this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly
make a life-saving difference.

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to
contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

Link for registration into Blood Donation Camp: *(Fill this out on or
before 27/09/2024)*


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_asjz8lC4zZHjVyxqu8PSZdZhPSnsSu0RJpj7wDmdhFlEzg/viewform?usp=sf_link



*Kishan Patel*

*NSS Program Coordinator *

*Charusat NSS Cell*

--

subject: SHORTLISTED | AICTE Approved Industrial Internships AND placement assistance program for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY students!
snippet: ğŸš€ Transform Your Career with Our Exclusive Training & Internship Program! ğŸš€ Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY, In collaboration with IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE,we are organizing a 2-Month Training +
content:
ğŸš€ Transform Your Career with Our Exclusive Training & Internship
Program! ğŸš€
Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY,

In collaboration with IIT ROORKEE COGNIZANCE,we are organizing a 2-Month
Training + Internship program with certifications from CISCO,
META|FACEBOOK, IBM & various other MNCs in technical and nontechnical
domains. We are enrolling only LIMITED STUDENTS from CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY.

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received the
notification, feel free to forward this mail to them.*

To apply for the program,Fill this Application/form. If shortlisted, you
will receive a call from our HR Team:
Submit Your Application <https://forms.gle/hZSA4ZPThzDZJiwv8>
Program Details

*First Month:* Expert training with live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals (10+ years of experience). Login credentials will be
provided to students after registration.

*Second Month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals, offering real-world problem-solving experience.
Project Details

*Project 1:* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern, to be
completed with their mentor.

*Project 2:* Capstone Project: A group project assigned to 15 interns, with
specific tasks for each intern. All necessary data and materials will be
provided by the company.
Class Format

*Blended Program:* Access to recorded classes and live doubt clearing
sessions every weekend.

*Mentor-led/Live Classes:* Live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM for 2-3 days a
week, with recorded sessions available.

*LMS Portal:* Access for 6 months.
Certificates

After completion of the program, students will receive:

   - Program completion certificate issued by IIT ROORKEE (COGNIZANCE).
   - Co-branded internship certificate from top MNCs.
   - 100% placement assistance.
   - Access to a thriving professional community.
   - WIPRO DICE Certification.

<https://chat.whatsapp.com/HiJOfD3gHhX5h1zRKAcikQ>

subject: Ozone layer depletion GROUP-A
VRUND 2024 Invitation & General Information
snippet: Dear Students, We will celebrate Vrund '24, the Annual Garba Festival, on Friday, September 27, 2024, from 6.00 pm onward. You are all cordially invited and are requested to take note of the
content:
Dear Students,



We will celebrate *Vrund '24*, the Annual Garba Festival, on Friday, *September
27, 2024, *from *6.00 pm* onward.



You are all cordially invited and are requested to take note of the
following:



   1. All entries to the garba ground will be from specific entry gates and
   upon showing the CHARUSAT ID Card. Cooperate with the Volunteers â€“ Teachers
   and Students.
   2. First-year and D2D Students will be required to show their
   E-Governance Copy â€“ Mobile / Hard Copy.
   3. Crowding should be avoided and it is to be ensured that students
   donâ€™t crowd at any one point particularly at the entry gate.
   4. There is no Garba and dressing competition.
   5. Buses will depart at 9:15 PM from the campus to respective locations.
   6. For food, arrangements of food stalls have been made. Our own Staff
   Members have established the stalls. Provide them encouragement.
   7. Teaching is suspended after 2:15 pm so as to give students
   appropriate time to go back and dress for the Garba.
   8. Changing rooms will also be set up in the DEPSTAR and CSPIT (EC)
   Buildings for the students commuting from farther places. Details will be
   shared by Convener, ULSC.

Your cooperation is requested to have our event befitting an â€œA+â€ grade
University.



Thanks & Regards,

-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Feedback form on Awareness workshop on Untabooing Menstruation And Sanitary Pad
snippet: Dear all, I hope you all are doing well. Thank you for attending the recent awareness workshop on â€œUntabooing Menstruation and Sanitary Pads.â€ We hope you found the session informative and empowering.
content:
Dear all,

I hope you all are doing well.

Thank you for attending the recent awareness workshop on â€œUntabooing
Menstruation and Sanitary Pads.â€ We hope you found the session informative
and empowering. Your participation and engagement were invaluable, and we
would love to hear your thoughts on the event.

To help us improve future workshops and better address the needs of our
audience, we ask that you please take a few minutes to fill out our
feedback form. Your honest feedback will be instrumental in enhancing the
quality and impact of our workshops.

*Feedback Form Link:* https://forms.gle/TVJ5bPpQP3G5pqLCA

We appreciate your time and effort in sharing your insights with us. Should
you have any additional comments or suggestions, please feel free to reply
to this email.

Thank you once again for your support and contribution to breaking the
taboos surrounding menstruation.


Thanks and Regards
*VIBHA PARMAR*





*Assistant Professor,M & V Patel Department of Electrical
Engineering,Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology, Changa - 388
421,Charotar University of Science and Technology,Dist: Anand, Gujarat,
India*
http://parmarvibha18.blogspot.com/

--

subject: Apply for Start-up Gujarat Seed Fund (30 Lakhs-40 Lakhs) via CIVF
snippet: Dear Start-up, As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8 company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a Nodal Institute by the Industries
content:
Dear Start-up,
As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8
company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*. We invite
you to apply for a seed grant to fuel your growth and innovation. Don't
miss this opportunity to accelerate your startup journey! (Find the scheme
document as *Ann-1*)

As a Nodal Institute, CIVF can now offer the following support:

   - Assistance up to *INR 30 lakh* as a *seed support* to the startups.
   - Sustenance allowance of *INR 20,000 per month *to the startups and *INR
   25,000 per month* to *women-led startups* for a period of one year.
   - Additional assistance up to *INR 10 lakh *for the startups generating
   significant impact on the society. Thus seed support extends to up to INR
   40 lakhs.
   - Assistance up to *INR 1 lakh* per startup for obtaining* training in
   soft skills *on a reimbursement basis.
   - Assistance up to *INR 3 lakh* to enroll and participate in
   national/international recognized *acceleration programs.*
   - Additional 1% Interest Subsidy, maximum up to* 9% on term loans* to
   applicants under the scheme's provisions for assistance to MSMEs.

The application process is as Under:

1. Read the eligibility criteria of the scheme. (Product/service should be
innovative, Company should be registered and the Start-up should be based
in Gujarat) *(*Refer to detailed eligibility criteria in* Ann-2)*

2. Fill out the form based on the benefit you want to avail. (Find all
applicable forms in the attachment as *Ann-3, Ann-4, Ann-5 & Ann-6. *Take
the pdf content of the application form in Word, enter the details in soft
copy, take print and sign and stamp on hard copy and send the original file
at CIVF- 209, IIIM)

2. Pitch deck presentation in front of CIVF Internal Committee.

3. CIVF will recommend the selected start-ups to Industries Commissionerate
for seed grant or other benefits.

4. If approved at the SLEC committee of  *Industries Commissionerate*, the
grant will be given to NI (i.e. CIVF) and be disbursed to start-up in
tranches based on your milestones.

All the Very Best and Feel free to seek further information.

*Deadline: 01/10/2024 till 12:30 PM*

Note: "Please share the above information with eligible start-up founders
to ensure that the deserving candidates can benefit from the government
scheme."
*Regards,*

*Dr. Swati Joshi, *
*Senior Executive Officer (SEO), *
*CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), **209, IIIM,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) *
*CHANGA - 388 421 *
*GUJARAT - INDIA *

*Contact no.: +91- 7383491911*
*E-mail: seo@civf.co.in <http://seo@civf.co.in/swatijoshi@civf.co.in>*

--

content:
Dear *FYCL/ME/EE* Students,

the attachment.

*[Seating arrangement for date: 23/09/2024 & 24/09/2024-Refer to attachment
no.1 **& date: 25/09/2024- Refer to attachment no.2]*

*Note:*


   - Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in
   the email attachment.
   - Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall.
   Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are strictly
   prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left outside, and it is
   mandatory to wear an ID card (if available).
   - Students have to take their seat in the exam hall at least 15
   minutes prior to the exam time.
   - The exam will be conducted in the CMPICA building for  *23/09/2024 &
   24/09/2024* and in the CSPIT building for *25/09/2024*.

Thank you.

subject: Final Batch Allocation for AICTE-Approved Advanced training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the* Final
batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 21/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 10 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> â€“ *Last 10 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  ğŸ‘‰*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:âœ… Artificial Intelligence.âœ… Data Science.âœ… Machine
Learning.âœ… Cloud Computing.âœ… Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :âœ… Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.âœ… The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.âœ… Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.âœ… Admittance to a growth community.*


  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com
592, 3rd Block, Koramangala 1A Block, Koramangala 3 Block, Koramangala,
Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068
<https://maps.google.com/?q=592,%203rd%20Block,%20Koramangala%201A%20Block,%20Koramangala%203%20Block,%20Koramangala,%20Bengaluru,%20Karnataka%20560068>

subject: Re: Join Us for a Hands-On Arduino Workshop on August 31, 2024!
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to reannounce a new date for"Hands-On with Arduino: A Beginner's Workshop." Workshop Highlights: Learn the fundamentals of Arduino hardware and software.
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to reannounce a new date for*"Hands-On with Arduino: A
Beginnerâ€™s Workshop." *

*Workshop Highlights:*

   - Learn the fundamentals of Arduino hardware and software.
   - Gain hands-on experience in building simple circuits and programming
   the Arduino.
   - Explore practical applications and project ideas that you can
   implement on your own.

Whether youâ€™re a complete beginner or have some experience, this workshop
is a great opportunity to enhance your skills and knowledge in embedded
systems and electronics.

*Participation Fee:* â‚¹100

*Date:* *October 05, 2024*
*Time:* 9:00AM to 4:00PM
*Venue:* EE Dept, CSPIT

Please re-register here to secure your spot
<https://forms.gle/iHDvM6hi51j5KMd56>

*IMPORTANT: All students who have registered previously are requested to
re-register.*

For registration and more information, please contact Undersigned.

We look forward to your active participation in this enriching learning
experience!

Happy Learning,

-Jignesh Patel, Mahammadsoaib Saiyad
--


*Jignesh S. Patel*Assistant Professor
M & V Department of Electrical Engineering,
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT),
CHARUSAT campus,
Changa
Contact (o): +91 2697 265047

*7* *Switch off as you go* | *q** Always recycle* | *P* *Save a tree..*|
*Please consider your environmental responsibility before printing this
e-mail *



On Wed, Aug 28, 2024 at 3:36â€¯PM Jignesh Patel <
jigneshpatel.ee@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear Students,
>
> Due to the severe weather conditions and our concern for everyoneâ€™s
> safety, we regret to inform you that the workshop on â€œHands-On with
> Arduino: A Beginnerâ€™s Workshop,â€ scheduled for 31 August 2024, has been
> postponed until further notice.
>
> CHARUSAT prioritizes the well-being of all students. We are actively
> working to reschedule the event and will notify you of the new date as soon
> as possible.
>
> We apologize for any inconvenience this postponement may cause and
> appreciate your understanding.
>
> Thank you for your continued interest and support.
>
> Happy Learning,
>
> -Jignesh Patel, Mahammadsoaib Saiyad
>

--

subject: Fwd: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Ritesh Bhatt <riteshbhatt.win@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, 19 Sept, 2024, 1:12 pm Subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs To:
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ritesh Bhatt <riteshbhatt.win@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 19 Sept, 2024, 1:12â€¯pm
Subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
To: <family@charusat.edu.in>


Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the
*First** batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 20/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 20 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> â€“ *Last 20 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Internship Opportunity: Adorebits - Internship Opportunities EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner
snippet: Dear Students, There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Adore Bits <
content:
*Dear Students,*
*There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those
who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad.*

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Adore Bits <contact@adorebits.com>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 2:29â€¯PM
Subject: EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner - Adorebits -
Internship Opportunities
To: niravbhattit <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>


ğŸŒŸ *Kickstart Your Career with Adorebits Technology Internship!* ğŸŒŸ

Are you ready to dive into the world of cutting-edge technology and
real-world business development? ğŸš€ Join Adorebits Technology, where
innovation meets opportunity!

Recognized as one of Indiaâ€™s Fastest Growing Hot 100 Innovative Technology
Companies and a technical partner of global names like the Chartered
Institute of Marketing, UK and EUCC - Malta Country, Adorebits is your
gateway to the future. With over 9 years of expertise in Blockchain, AI/ML,
and more, weâ€™re reshaping industriesâ€”and now, we want YOU to be part of
this exciting journey!

ğŸ¯ *Why Choose Adorebits Technology?*

1. *Real-World Learning*: Gain hands-on experience in live international
projects, working with the latest in *Business Development*, Brand
Management, Digital Marketing, and more.
2. *Work from Anywhere*: Enjoy the flexibility of a *remote internship*,
fitting work into your schedule wherever you are.
3. *Expert Mentorship*: Learn from seasoned professionals featured in
*Economic Times and Yourstory*.
4. *People-Centric Culture*: Thrive in a collaborative, intern-friendly
environment where your voice matters!
5. *5 Days a Week Culture*: Embrace a balanced workweek with weekends off.
6. *Work-Life Balance*: Benefit from a supportive environment that values
your personal well-being.
7. *Flexible Working Time*: Adapt your working hours to fit your schedule.
8. *Live Client Work Exposure*: Gain real-world experience by working
directly with clients on impactful projects.

ğŸ’¡ *What Youâ€™ll Learn*:
- Gain practical experience in Business Development, Brand Management,
Digital Marketing, and more.
- Tackle real-world challenges and solutions in a global tech company.

ğŸ’¼ *An Unpaid, Yet Priceless Experience*:
While the internship is unpaid, the quality of learning and global exposure
is invaluable. Youâ€™ll build a portfolio of live, impactful projects,
setting yourself apart in the competitive tech world. On successful
completion of the internship, a certificate will be awarded.

If youâ€™re passionate about tech, innovation, and growth, this is your
chance to stand out!

ğŸ”— *Apply Now*: https://forms.gle/aausA1rGeEtMiTio7

Letâ€™s spread the word! Share this opportunity with your network and help
connect enthusiastic candidates with a future in tech! For queries, reach
out at contact@adorebits.com.

ğŸŒ Adorebits â€“ Where Innovation and Opportunity Meet!

-
Regards
HR Team
Adorebits Technology











-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: Dear New Students... To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps: 1:- open URL http://egov.charusat (Open URL within campus only) 2:- Login with your egovernance ID and Password 3:-
content:
Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

--

subject: Supercharge Your Career with IEEE â€“ Student Branch Recruitment Open!!
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We're excited to invite you to join the IEEE CSPIT Student Branch 2024-25, a platform designed to help you grow both academically and professionally. Whether you're looking
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

Weâ€™re excited to invite you to join the *IEEE CSPIT Student Branch* 2024-25,
a platform designed to help you grow both *academically* and
*professionally*. Whether you're looking to gain hands-on experience, build
your resume, or expand your network, IEEE has something for you!

*What is IEEE?*

IEEE is the worldâ€™s largest technical professional organization. Our
Student Branches are university-based groups that offer opportunities for
career development, technical learning, leadership experience, and
networking within fields of engineering and related disciplines.
Why Join the IEEE Student Branch?

   1.

   *Build Your Resume with Projects and Skills*
   Participate in technical projects, workshops, and hackathons that
   provide *real-world experience* in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software
   Development. These projects will help you showcase your skills to future
   employers.
   2.

   *Exclusive Networking Opportunities*
   Connect with *industry professionals*, *mentors*, and peers from around
   the world. These connections can open doors for internships, jobs, and
   career advice.
   3.

   *Leadership Experience*
   Take on leadership roles within the branch to develop your *management,
   team-building*, and *communication skills*â€”all valuable assets for your
   resume.
   4.

   *Access to Global Competitions and Events*
   Participate in global events like *IEEE Xtreme* and attend IEEE
   conferences. These are great opportunities to demonstrate your abilities
   and enhance your *professional profile*.
   5.

   *Resources to Stay Ahead*
   Gain access to the *IEEE Xplore* digital library and other exclusive
   IEEE resources, giving you an edge in coursework, research, and beyond.

------------------------------
Join One of Our Teams

As part of the IEEE Student Branch, you can also choose to join one of our
three specialized teams, based on your interests:

   - *Creative Media Team*: Get involved with content creation, graphic
   design, and social media, helping us promote our branch activities.
   - *Event Handling Team*: Plan, organize, and manage events like
   workshops and networking sessions, gaining valuable event management
   experience.
   - *Branch Representatives Team*: Act as a bridge between the branch and
   students, boosting engagement and awareness of our events.

If you do not want to be part of any of these 3 teams, but still want to be
part of *IEEE CSPIT SB* then you can always be a *Volunteer.*
Each of these teams offers you a great way to contribute, build skills, and
work closely with fellow students.
------------------------------
How to Join

Interested? Itâ€™s easy! Simply fill out the below google form and we will
call you for the selection process.

https://forms.gle/DMW9ZJh8hpv2eQG47

The Selection process consists of an interview round with the Executive
Committee of IEEE CSPIT SB and Faculty Advisor Harshul Yagnik Sir.

Once you fill out the google form you will be called for the interview
round and the allotments to specific teams will follow.

If you have any questions or want to learn more, feel free to reach out to
us at ieee.charusatsb@gmail.com or contact us on WhatsApp -

*Sakshi Shah [21CS064] - 9429866748*

Donâ€™t miss this chance to boost your career and be part of a global network!


Looking Forward to have you onboard,
IEEE CSPIT SB 2024-25
[image: image.png]

subject: CSPIT 2024 State Quota (ACPC) Admission : MYSY Documents Submission / Verification
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for the students admitted in the year 2024 under STATE QUOTA at CSPIT EE/EC Building â€“ UIIC office,
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification
start for the students admitted in the year 2024 *under STATE QUOTA
at CSPIT EE/EC Building â€“ UIIC office, Room No 102A.*

*For fresh students admitted in the year 2024 under Management Quota OR
Vacant Quota will be intimated soon.*

 *Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form). *

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Students must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form. *

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank). *

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at UIIC office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at UIIC office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*

3.      University shall remain closed from 25th October 2024 (Friday) to 5
th November 2024 (Tuesday) during the Diwali Festival.


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*
--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade â€œA+â€ by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

subject: Contest : Creative Name of CSPIT Newsletter
snippet: Dear CSPIT Student(s), Greetings!! We are pleased to announce the creative contest, "Name the CSPIT Newsletter" organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC), Chandubhai S. Patel
content:
*Dear CSPIT Student(s),*


Greetings!!



We are pleased to announce the creative contest, *"Name the CSPIT
Newsletter"* organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC),
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT), CHARUSAT.



We are preparing to launch our very first newsletter in *December 2024*, to
be published *quarterly* every year. The CSPIT Newsletter will highlight
studentsâ€™ achievements, research, campus events, etc.



For this newsletter, we invite all current students to suggest a creative
name that perfectly captures the *spirit, innovation, and academic
excellence* *of CSPIT. *



*Salient features of the Contest:*


   1. The Contest is open from *September 23, 2024*, *12.01 AM* *to **September
   30, 2024, 11:59 PM**. *
   2. The best 3 names will be selected by the Scrutiny Committee. Winners
   will receive acknowledgement in the Inaugural newsletter, a certificate
   of appreciation and prize money.
   3. The Prize money for the First three entries will be distributed as
   follows:


   - 1st Prize â€“ Rs. 2,500
   - 2nd prize â€“ Rs. 1,500
   - 3rd prize â€“ Rs. 1,000

Participants can submit their submissions through the Registration QR Code. For
more information like registration, eligibility and submission guidelines,
important dates, selection process, intellectual property rights,  and
other terms and conditions, please refer to the attached Brochure of
this contest.



For any queries, please contact the Coordinators of the Contest:



Ms. Trusha Patel (trushagajjar.ce@charusat.ac.in)

Dr. V. R. Panchal (vijaypanchal.cv@charusat.ac.in)



Thank you for being a part of this contest.



We look forward to seeing your creativity.


With best wishes


Trushit Upadhyaya

-- 
I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand
Gujarat, India.

--

subject: ULSC logo competition!
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your creativity and design skills while contributing
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the
students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your
creativity and design skills while contributing to an important aspect of
our student governance body.

*Competition Details:*
*Theme : *Design a logo that represents the values, vision, and mission of
the University level Central Students Council(ULSC).
*Eligibility : *Open to all students of CHARUSAT.
*Submission Format :* Logo designs must be created digitally and submitted
in .PNG or .JPEG format (high resolution).
*Submission Deadline : 22th September, 2024*

   - *VISION: - *To build an inclusive student community that fosters
   academic excellence, cultural enrichment, leadership, and holistic
   development.
   - *VALUES: - *We value inclusivity, collaboration, and excellence in all
   endeavors. Leadership, integrity, innovation, and student well-being are at
   the core of our actions.
   - MISSION: - Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to
   grow academically, culturally, and personally, promote teamwork and
   leadership, and advocate for student needs to create a supportive
   university environment.

*Google Form: *https://forms.gle/VEQhCobuiNDhT7ri8
Submit your entries here

Further details have been shared in the document attached below.

We look forward to seeing your creative submissions!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: PPT format for the Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024.
snippet: Dear Students, An event titled "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024" is organized by MS Patel Department of Civil Engineering, inspired by the popular TV show Shark Tank. The event
content:
Dear Students,

An event titled* "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024"* is organized
by M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering, *inspired by the popular TV
show Shark Tank*. The event is scheduled for September 21, 2024. The event
is open to all year students enrolled in the CSPIT.

The event allows students to showcase their start-up plans in front of a
panel of judges/jury members (drawn from the faculty members of IIIM,
CHARUSAT). The event aims to foster an entrepreneurial spirit among the
students, amplify their business strategies and learn what it takes to
launch a successful company. A detailed brochure of this event is attached
herewith.

This competition has two rounds. In the first round, after completion of
your registration, you have to prepare your PPT as per the format attached
below and submit it before September 19, 2024. In the final round, selected
groups have to present their business plan in front of the jury
on September 21, 2024.

For any further querries you can contact me.


Thanks & Regards

Ms. Hemangi Oza
M. Tech Environment Engineer
Assistant Professor
Dept. of Civil Engineering
CSPIT CHARUSAT
Changa, Anand.
Mo. No.: 8780473646

--

subject: Fwd: Awareness Session on "UnTabooing Menstruation and Sanitary Pads "
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Convener Women Development Cell CHARUSAT <convener.wdc@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Sep 13, 2024 at 1:59 PM Subject: Awareness Session on "
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Convener Women Development Cell CHARUSAT <convener.wdc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Sep 13, 2024 at 1:59â€¯PM
Subject: Awareness Session on "UnTabooing Menstruation and Sanitary Pads "
To: Womencell CHARUSAT <womencellmembers.charusat@charusat.ac.in>


Dear all,

The Women Development Cell  is organizing an expert session on â€œ  *UnTabooing
Menstruation and Sanitary Pads *ğŸ©¸*â€* *on September 16, 2024*. The session
is designed for university girl students, Teaching and Non-teaching females
to break the taboo around menstruation and promote better menstrual hygiene
practices.

This initiative aims to create a safe and open environment for discussing
menstrual health, combat societal taboos, and equip students with knowledge
and resources for better hygiene practices. By fostering this
understanding, I hope to encourage positive attitudes toward menstrual
health, which is crucial for young women's overall well-being and
empowerment.

 Details:


Date

*16th September, 2024*

Day

*Monday*

Time

*10:10  to 11:30*

Title of Talk

*UnTabooing Menstruation and Sanitary Pads*

Venue

*2ND Floor EE/EC building (A6)*

Invited Speaker

*Anuj Rathore*
FOUNDER and CEO of Healthy Naari

Vadodara, Gujarat, India

Objective

Understanding menstruation and its biological importance.

The myths and taboos surrounding menstruation in society.

The importance of proper menstrual hygiene and the role of sanitary pads.

Practical tips and resources for managing menstrual health.

Market product Demo

Registration link
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe7l0PF444EUiLbWDsc0wXW3SUGQtFXzSjD9SES2II1u4ztDQ/viewform?usp=sf_link


*Kindly circulate it in your respected Institute and ensure the
participation of all female participants in the event.*
*Registration is free but mandatory for all female participants.*


*Best Regards,*

*Convener, WDC*

--

subject: Fwd: Policy: Financial Support for UG & PG Students to Presenting Research Papers @ Conferences/Symposiums
snippet: Dear Students, As per the trailing mail you can get upto Rs. 15000.00 per year for publishing your research paper in Scopus/WoS conference. All the students are requested to take advantage of the
content:
Dear Students,
As per the trailing mail you can get upto Rs. 15000.00 per year for
publishing your research paper in Scopus/WoS conference.
All the students are requested to take advantage of the scheme.
The policy is attached with trailing mail.
Regards,

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 7, 2024 at 10:46â€¯AM
Subject: Policy: Financial Support for UG & PG Students to Presenting
Research Papers @ Conferences/Symposiums
To: <dean@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Principal <principal@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>,
HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Coordinator IQAC CHARUSAT <
coordinator.iqac@charusat.ac.in>, Deputy Account Officer CHARUSAT <
dy.ao@charusat.ac.in>, Kautil Pandya <kautilpandya.adm@charusat.ac.in>,
Rakesh Dave <rakeshdave.bt@charusat.ac.in>, mukeshkumar yadav <
mukeshyadav.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Rajendra Solanki <
rajendrasolanki.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Deputy Registrar (HR and General
Admin.) CHARUSAT <dy.registrar.hrd@charusat.ac.in>, Dean Academic <
dean.academic@charusat.ac.in>, Dipen Patel <dipenpatel.rnd@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

Please find attached herewith a separate policy for financial support for
undergraduate (UG) and postgraduate (PG) students who wish to present their
research papers at National / International Conferences / Symposiums.

Also, to facilitate the smooth implementation of this policy, we have
constituted an *Institute-Level Advisory Committee (IAC)* as follows: This
committee will play an important role in monitoring the selection process
and evaluating the applications, and it will forward the recommendations to
the Dean of the Faculty for consideration.

1.      Head / Principal of the Institute - Chairperson
2.      *One senior faculty member of the concern institute nominated by
the Dean-Member*
3.      One senior faculty member from another institute nominated by the
Registrarâ€“Member
4.      Dy. Registrar / Asst. Registrar of the concern institute â€“ Member
Secretary


*We kindly request all Deans to please click here
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mg9XVQGSlQORzpZAF_tM1EPoA8UQzDHUbvm5BB13nFo/edit?usp=sharing>
and
share senior faculty member names on or before 09/02/2024 who would be
valuable additions to the IAC.*

With regards,

Dr. Atul Patel

Registrar


Accredited Grade â€œA+â€ by NAAC

www.charusat.ac.in





--

Associate professor & Head,

CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421

*From*

*Dr. Devang Joshi, Registrar*

To

All Deans & Principals, CHARUSAT

All Faculties and Students

Subject

Detention Rules effective from Academic Year 2021-22 and Applicable to
students admitted in Academic Year 2021-22.

Circular No

CHA/EXAM/09/21/25

Date

29/09/2021

*Circular*
Detention Rules effective from Academic Year 2021-22 and Applicable to
students admitted in Academic Year 2021-22.

 Dear All,

 The University has introduced new detention rule as under:  *A
student will be promoted to next year
only if he/she has cleared all the courses of* *the year he/she is studying
in. *This rule replaces prevailing detention rules 8.2(iii), 8.2(iv) and
8.2(v).

 The above revised detention rule will take effect from the academic year
2021-22. It will apply to all the students who are admitted from the
academic year 2021-22.

 All are requested to take note of this. Also communicate this personally
to Academic Year 2021 admitted students allocated for mentorship.

 Principals are requested to display this information on the Notice Board
and communicate to various Stakeholders.





*Dr. Devang Joshi*

*Registrar *

--

Associate professor & Head,

Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,

subject: Tips for using your new inbox
snippet: Welcome to your inbox Find emails fast With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive all your email and find it later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry
content:
Tips for using your new inbox
[image: Gmail]

Welcome to your inbox
[image: Search]
Find emails fast
With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6576?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all your email and find it
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6593?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry about
what to keep.
[image: Personalize]
Personalize Mail Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail
Customize inbox backgrounds, email signatures, and other options in Mail
Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail settings
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6562?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>.
Review and adjust your privacy and security settings at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/>.
[image: Organize]
Organize your email
You can organize email with labels
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/118708?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>,
which are like folders, but you can add more than one label to a message.
You can also use filters
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6579?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
to automatically sort and categorize messages as they come in.
[image: Social]
Chat and meet directly from your inbox
Message with contacts in Google Chat
<https://support.google.com/chat/answer/9341104?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
and start video meetings with up to 100 people in Google Meet
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/9822902?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all without leaving Gmail.

Get training and tips
Find Gmail guides, tips, cheat sheets, help switching from MicrosoftÂ®
OutlookÂ®, and more at the Google Workspace Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
.
Visit the Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>

Happy emailing,
The Gmail Team
[image: Google Cloud]
